programme.title: Горячая точка
programme.desc: Группа специального реагирования (ГСР) проводит рейд на заброшенном стекольном заводе, где базируется экстремистская группировка расистского толка, планирующая серию мощных взрывов. Во время операции получает ранение сержант Грег Паркер. Вскоре выясняется, что сигнал в службу 911 поступил от одного из участников группировки — он продолжает посещать собрания, чтобы присматривать за младшим братом. Команда ГСР обнаруживает, что исчезли три взрывных устройства. Один из предполагаемых террористов — тот самый младший брат — направляется в управление по делам гражданства и иммиграции, и группа немедленно следует за ним, чтобы предотвратить возможный теракт.

programme.title: Горячая точка
programme.desc: Сотрудники полиции участвуют во всех особо важных делах – спасении заложников и переговорах с террористами, эвакуации жителей и обезвреживании бомб, охоте на серийного убийцу и даже решении семейных конфликтов. В арсенале у участников ГСР (группы стратегического реагирования) не только высокотехнологичное оружие, но еще и быстрый ум, интуиция и… багаж собственных проблем и травм, которые часто влияют на их работу.

programme.title: Горячая точка
programme.desc: Когда Группа Один прибывает на место стрельбы, они выясняют, что брат Эда, Рой, оказался вовлечён в дела с торговцем оружием. После увольнения из полиции и обвинений в краже 100 тысяч долларов из улик, Рой внедрился в преступную группу. Однако ему приходится раскрыть своё прикрытие, чтобы спасти Джулс. Во время столкновения торговец оружием стреляет в Роя, но Сэм успевает нейтрализовать преступника. К счастью, Рой остаётся жив — его спас бронежилет.

programme.title: Горячая точка
programme.desc: Алексис ведёт затворнический образ жизни, и её единственным собеседником остаётся оператор службы 911. Когда во время звонка слышны выстрелы, оператор вызывает Группу Один. В ходе расследования становится ясно, что Алексис и её семья находятся под программой защиты свидетелей — она стала очевидцем убийства, в котором замешаны трое коррумпированных полицейских. Тем временем в штаб ГСР приезжает сын Грега Дина.

programme.title: Горячая точка
programme.desc: Сюжет сосредоточен на внутреннем расследовании, касающемся действий Группы Один во время операции в городском музее, где произошло массовое убийство. В то время как на нейтрализацию стрелка ушло 37 минут — вместо регламентированных 15 — команда сталкивается с давлением со стороны агента, оценивающего их работу. Группе приходится оправдывать каждое своё решение. Поначалу всё выглядит как случайная трагедия, но вскоре выясняется, что за преступлением стоит женщина, потерявшая мужа из-за аллергии на лекарство. programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: The Wattersons are a totally normal family. Dad is your regular 6"4 pink rabbit who stays at home while Mom works in a rainbow factory. Their kids are pretty standard too - theres Gumball, a blue cat with a giant head, Anais, a 4 year old genius bunny, and Darwin, a pet goldfish that became part of the family when he sprouted legs. At the heart of the show is Gumball, who faces the trials and tribulations of any twelve-year-old kid - like being chased by a rampaging T-Rex, sleeping rough when a robot steals his identity, or dressing as a cheerleader and doing the splits to impress the girl of his dreams. Simple everyday issues weve all been through. Gumballs hometown of Elmore is every bit as commonplace… a cactus waters his front lawn, a furry slug drives to work, and on the corner a balloon, a potato and a ghost all wait for the school bus. Welcome to The Amazing World of Gumball, where normal just got a little bit weird…

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Gumball sets out to solve the mystery of who stuffed Principal Brown into his locker. / Gumball and Darwins harmless pranks on Dad spiral hopelessly out of control. / Gumball and Darwins martial arts costumes make them a laughing stock at school. / Gumball is traumatised when accidentally kissed on the mouth by his Grandma JoJo. / Gumball and Darwin are invited to a high school party and have to bring a date! / Gumball and Darwin unsuccessfully attempt to get a refund for their computer game. / Gumball discovers that Bobert is planning to take over his identity and replace him! / Gumball and Darwin barely survive a school picnic in the Forest of Doom. / Gumball sets out to win his Dad back by winning a blindfolded "dumb" race.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: The Wattersons run over Santa Claus and must save Christmas. / Gumball and Darwin receive an heirloom from Richard but lose it. / Bobert loses a bet to Gumball so has to obey him for 24 hours. / Gumball asks Idaho to teach his family to live a simpler life. / Gumball teaches Darwin a lesson after Darwin leaves him. / Granny JoJos overprotective behavior puts the Wattersons in danger. / Gumball thinks Teri is way too scared of germs. / Gumball and Darwin rent a film called A Ponys Tail to watch with Anais but keep getting distracted on their way home. / Gumball destroys Alan and Carmens relationship and has to reunite them.

programme.title: The Wonderfully Weird World of Gumball‌
programme.desc: After tasting Masamis gourmet, double-truffle mac-n-cheese at lunch, Gumball decides to do whatever it takes to get a full serving of the delicious meal.

programme.title: Craig of the Creek
programme.desc: Craig and his two best friends, Kelsey and JP, are always going on adventures in the untamed suburban wilderness known as the Creek - a kid utopia where tribes of children rule over tree forts and bike ramps, making up an entire kid society. Each episode finds the kids either venturing into unexplored areas of the Creek, encountering new Creek Kids, or just getting into trouble at their hang out - the Stump.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Elmore residents are going missing and the cause of these disappearances may be closer to home than Gumball and Darwin think. A breaking news report tells the Wattersons that their neighbour is among the several mysterious disappearances happening across Elmore. Their search for clues leads them to find a strange egg which they soon discover belongs to their own Evil Turtle. The family realise that its their responsibility to track down their pet before she and her brood do more damage to the town.

programme.title: Teen Titans Go!
programme.desc: Robin, Starfire, Cyborg, Beast Boy and Raven continue the fun in season seven of TEEN TITANS GO! with all-new comedic adventures, giving viewers a look at what life is really like as a teen super hero ... once the cape comes off. Inspired by and featuring the principal voice cast of the original Teen Titans series, this character-driven comedy - based upon DC characters - focuses on the funny that happens in between saving the world and living together as teenagers without adult supervision. With epic staring contests to decide who does the laundry, a series of quests and battles to construct the perfect sandwich or fighting crime in Jump City, one thing is for sure - these Titans are always ready for an adventure, inside the house and out.

programme.title: We Bare Bears
programme.desc: Some new neighbours set up camp next to the Bears cave. Panda and Ice love it, but Grizz thinks theyre up to no good. / Grizz screens an epic amateur movie he just made for a focus group. But when he notices people are leaving, he must figure out ways to keep the audience engaged. / The Baby Bears dreams come true when they find a 100-dollar bill. But when they cant bear to spend it, they realise its difficult to let go. / The Baby Bears become prizes for a carnival game in hopes of being won and taken to a new home. Actors: Eric Edelstein, Demetri Martin, Bobby Moynihan, . Director: Manny Hernandez,Daniel Chong,.

programme.title: We Bare Bears
programme.desc: Panda goes on a mission to return a lost phone to the girl of his dreams. / After accidentally wounding an animal, Rangers Tabes quits her job. The Bears do what they can to coax her out of retirement. / Ice Bear goes on a late-night adventure to rescue his friend, Yana, from some familiar foes. / Charlie hosts an evening of spooky stories starring the Bears.

programme.title: We Bare Bears
programme.desc: Charlie hosts an evening of spooky stories starring the Bears. / A storm rolls in while the Bears are separated. Grizz looks after the Poppy Rangers. Panda is stuck with Charlie in his car. Chloe and Ice Bear are in the city seeking a ride home. / Charlie tells some scary stories featuring the Bears and their friends. Actors: Eric Edelstein, Demetri Martin, Bobby Moynihan, . Director: Manny Hernandez,Daniel Chong,.

programme.title: Krypto Saves the Day!
programme.desc: When a black cat crosses Kryptos path, hes determined to catch it before Halloween night is through.

programme.title: Clarence
programme.desc: Follow the daily adventures of a 10-year-old boy named Clarence, and his two best friends Sumo and Jeff. Clarence lives with his mother Mary and her boyfriend Chad in the fictional town of Aberdale, and he is optimistic, curious, honest and quirky boy, who sees the best in everyone and gets himself in a variety of funny situations and everyday problems, which he solves with lots of imagination and with the help from his friends.

programme.title: Bunnicula
programme.desc: Once upon a time an extraordinary bunny is born in an average family of bunnies. The little guy looks just like a vampire- he has sharp fangs, his ears remind of bat wings and plus he is scared of sunlight. Bunnicula is never out in daylight, sleeps in a coffin, flies with bat wings, and drains juice from vegetables with his fangs which gives him enormous power. His family is afraid that he will attack somebody so they lock him in an old mansion. Bunnicula has been sleeping for many years until a little girl Mina unlocks hims and makes him a new member of her family. Her dog named Harold makes friends with Bunnicula straight away but the cat Chester is a little bit scared of him and does not seem to be happy about a new pet.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: The Wattersons are swapping scary stories on a family vacation, when their car breaks down in the middle of the desert. They are left with no alternative but to trust a complete stranger, whose appearance matches the scary guy in Moms story. When the stranger brings them to a derelict gas station, just as he did in moms made-up scary story, the Wattersons can no longer pretend the story isnt coming true.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Gumball Darwin and Carrie team up to convince their fellow students that the school is haunted. At Halloween show and tell the class isnt buying Gumballs story about Gargaroth The Devourer until Carrie fakes a terrifying haunting. The kids convince the school to hire them as ghost exterminators and take their payment in Halloween candy. But when it turns out Gargaroth is real suddenly Gumball is expected to be the towns saviour.

programme.title: Scooby-Doo! And the Spooky Scarecrow
programme.desc: Scooby-Doo and the rest of the ghost-busting gang visit a quiet farm town where everyone is preparing for the annual Halloween harvest celebration. Of course, things are not as quiet as they seem, since the towns creepy cornfield is plagued by a scarecrow, known as Cornfield Clem, brought to life by a witchs curse! After two people are attacked by the scarecrow in the Cobb Corner haunted corn maze, the mayor closes down the corn maze and all other Halloween festivities for the year. Unless the gang can stop the scarecrow, Cobb Corner will have no Halloween! Will the always-hungry heroes, Scooby-Doo and Shaggy, be able to stop gulping down goodies long enough to solve this mystery?

programme.title: Lego Scooby-Doo! Knight Time Terror
programme.desc: When an old, haunted house known as Grimsley Mansion opens to the public, the Scooby gang investigates, not only to locate a treasure in gold left by the houses prospector-owner, but to solve the mystery behind a legendary "Black Knight" who roams the corridors at night to keep visitors away. Its the gold that everyones after, including the ghost himself, who turns out to be the Black Knight, a haunted suit of armor that Augustus purchased when he first built the house.

programme.title: Total DramaRama
programme.desc: Total DramaRama is canadian animated comedy series, spin-off of Total Drama, all characters are already well-known and loved by the audience. This time Duncan, Gwen, Courtney, Izzy, Noah, Bridgette and the rest find themselves in the past as kids and their adventures take place in kindergarten. The strict Chef Hatchet is there to keep his eye on them. Any harmless idea of the kids turns out to be a total disaster, they are irrepressible in producing new ideas on how to have fun. the kids are discussing every single decision and plan in front of the cameras just like their adult versions, being a part of a reality show.

programme.title: Krypto Saves the Day!
programme.desc: When a black cat crosses Kryptos path, hes determined to catch it before Halloween night is through.

programme.title: Craig of the Creek
programme.desc: Craig and his two best friends, Kelsey and JP, are always going on adventures in the untamed suburban wilderness known as the Creek - a kid utopia where tribes of children rule over tree forts and bike ramps, making up an entire kid society. Each episode finds the kids either venturing into unexplored areas of the Creek, encountering new Creek Kids, or just getting into trouble at their hang out - the Stump.

programme.title: Clarence
programme.desc: Follow the daily adventures of a 10-year-old boy named Clarence, and his two best friends Sumo and Jeff. Clarence lives with his mother Mary and her boyfriend Chad in the fictional town of Aberdale, and he is optimistic, curious, honest and quirky boy, who sees the best in everyone and gets himself in a variety of funny situations and everyday problems, which he solves with lots of imagination and with the help from his friends.

programme.title: Clarence
programme.desc: Follow the daily adventures of a 10-year-old boy named Clarence, and his two best friends Sumo and Jeff. Clarence lives with his mother Mary and her boyfriend Chad in the fictional town of Aberdale, and he is optimistic, curious, honest and quirky boy, who sees the best in everyone and gets himself in a variety of funny situations and everyday problems, which he solves with lots of imagination and with the help from his friends.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Elmore residents are going missing and the cause of these disappearances may be closer to home than Gumball and Darwin think. A breaking news report tells the Wattersons that their neighbour is among the several mysterious disappearances happening across Elmore. Their search for clues leads them to find a strange egg which they soon discover belongs to their own Evil Turtle. The family realise that its their responsibility to track down their pet before she and her brood do more damage to the town.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: The Wattersons are a totally normal family. Dad is your regular 6"4 pink rabbit who stays at home while Mom works in a rainbow factory. Their kids are pretty standard too - theres Gumball, a blue cat with a giant head, Anais, a 4 year old genius bunny, and Darwin, a pet goldfish that became part of the family when he sprouted legs. At the heart of the show is Gumball, who faces the trials and tribulations of any twelve-year-old kid - like being chased by a rampaging T-Rex, sleeping rough when a robot steals his identity, or dressing as a cheerleader and doing the splits to impress the girl of his dreams. Simple everyday issues weve all been through. Gumballs hometown of Elmore is every bit as commonplace… a cactus waters his front lawn, a furry slug drives to work, and on the corner a balloon, a potato and a ghost all wait for the school bus. Welcome to The Amazing World of Gumball, where normal just got a little bit weird…

programme.title: Teen Titans Go!
programme.desc: Robin, Starfire, Cyborg, Beast Boy and Raven continue the fun in season seven of TEEN TITANS GO! with all-new comedic adventures, giving viewers a look at what life is really like as a teen super hero ... once the cape comes off. Inspired by and featuring the principal voice cast of the original Teen Titans series, this character-driven comedy - based upon DC characters - focuses on the funny that happens in between saving the world and living together as teenagers without adult supervision. With epic staring contests to decide who does the laundry, a series of quests and battles to construct the perfect sandwich or fighting crime in Jump City, one thing is for sure - these Titans are always ready for an adventure, inside the house and out.

programme.title: Scooby-Doo! and the Goblin King
programme.desc: Shaggy, Scooby and the gang visit an eerie carnival on Halloween night, but all is not as it seems when the evil Goblin King makes an appearance!

programme.title: Krypto Saves the Day!
programme.desc: When a black cat crosses Kryptos path, hes determined to catch it before Halloween night is through.

programme.title: Adventure Time
programme.desc: Adventure Time is an American fantasy animated television series that shows a 12-year-old boy Finn and his best friend, a wise 28-year-old (in dog years) dog Jake with magical powers living in Lands of Ooo in post-apocalyptic world. They lean on each other during good and bad times, trust each another with secrets and look to each other for advice. Finn likes to travel and save princesses from evil monsters in Lands of Ooo. Jake is more than his friend, he is his mentor, and his extraordinary skills help the boy to fight evil. Finn and Jake hang out with Princess Bubblegum, the sovereign of the Candy Kingdom, the fearsome Ice King, an ice wizard, Marceline the Vampire Queen, a 1000-year-old vampire and rock musician and many more.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: The Wattersons are swapping scary stories on a family vacation, when their car breaks down in the middle of the desert. They are left with no alternative but to trust a complete stranger, whose appearance matches the scary guy in Moms story. When the stranger brings them to a derelict gas station, just as he did in moms made-up scary story, the Wattersons can no longer pretend the story isnt coming true.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Gumball Darwin and Carrie team up to convince their fellow students that the school is haunted. At Halloween show and tell the class isnt buying Gumballs story about Gargaroth The Devourer until Carrie fakes a terrifying haunting. The kids convince the school to hire them as ghost exterminators and take their payment in Halloween candy. But when it turns out Gargaroth is real suddenly Gumball is expected to be the towns saviour.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Gumball is walking in the same direction as Hot Dog Guy and with each step it becomes increasingly awkward. Gumball is too busy singing about ketchup to notice hes about to bump into Hot Dog Guy. They manage to get through an awkward moment only to discover theyre travelling in the same direction. Their journey becomes increasingly awkward until a delusional mall cop tries to arrest them and in the process allows them to finally go their separate ways…

Gumballs hometown of Elmore is every bit as commonplace… a cactus waters his front lawn, a furry slug drives to work, and on the corner a balloon, a potato and a ghost all wait for the school bus. Welcome to The Amazing World of Gumball, where normal just got a little bit weird…

programme.title: Quest Means Business
programme.desc: Hes not messing around: Richard Quest presents his hot takes on the biggest breaking stories in the world of business. Watch for the expert analysis, commentary and opinions on the important headlines in the field from the notorious English journalist and CNN anchor. Joined by a cast of experts and correspondents delivering unrivaled facts and news, but also features and fascinating takes, figures and analysis on everything going down in the world of business.

programme.title: The Lead with Jake Tapper
programme.desc: News, politics and current affairs programme hosted by the award-winning, American journalist and author, Jake Tapper. Jake Tapper is the chief Washington correspondent for CNN and he will share his knowledge and insight into politics as well as covering a variety of other topics. This programme discusses a range of stories from topical events including national news, economics/finance, sports, health, technology and world affairs. The Lead with Jake Tapper has won a number of awards and accolades including three National Headliner Awards. Outside his work on television, Tapper has written for The New Yorker, The Washington Post and the Los Angeles Times as well as publishing his first novel, a political thriller.

programme.title: World Sport
programme.desc: One of the CNNs longest running programmes that allows viewers to find out all the global sports news, see all the important events and most interesting parts, and enjoy the interviews with sports pundits and various sports stars.

programme.title: The Brief with Jim Sciutto
programme.desc: The best of CNNs reporting from correspondents across the world, to guide global audiences through the fast-paced news cycle with insight, analysis and hard-hitting interviews.

programme.title: Erin Burnett OutFront
programme.desc: Hosted by Erin Burnett, an expert in political science and economics, OutFront is an hour-long news programme examining the latest stories from the US and further afield. Broadcast live from either the New York studio or live on location from the site of a breaking story, the show features insightful opinions from informed guests. With expert analysis from CNNs correspondents and analysis from the shows panel, Erin Burnett OutFront dissects the stories of the day, leaving no stone unturned. Burnett, a former financial analyst for Goldman Sachs, uses her forthright approach to engage interviewees in honest discussion.

programme.title: Anderson Cooper
programme.desc: Anderson Cooper delves into the days news, looking beyond the broadcast to give his take, prompting us to re-think what we hear in the headlines. Cooper has covered major, international stories like the aftermath of Hurricane Katrina on the Gulf Coast, the catastrophic BP oil spill and the 2010 earthquake in Haiti, which saw the whole world fall silent. The show has won an absolute plethora of awards over the years, including GLAAD Media and Emmy awards.

programme.title: CNN NewsNight
programme.desc: Abby Phillip leads a roundtable discussion on the days biggest stories and issues shaping our world.

programme.title: Laura Coates Live
programme.desc: Laura Coates goes inside the story with a relentless pursuit of the facts.

programme.title: CNN Newsroom
programme.desc: CNN Newroom provides the most up to date news as it breaks and is the longest running show on the channel, airing twice a day Monday to Friday and throughout the day over the weekends. CNN has developed a lot since its founding in 1980 by American media proprietor Ted Turner as a 24 hour cable news channel. As an organisation, CNN have won multiple awards, including a network-record six news and documentary Emmy Awards in 2018.

programme.title: Tech for Good
programme.desc: Inspiring series following CNN correspondent Kristie Lu Stout as she meets incredible individuals all around the world whose lives were changed by technology. Their stories prove that technologies can help overcome different personal difficulties and enable people to follow their dreams despite them. Technological innovations offered these fascinating people a chance to pursue careers in fields that would otherwise be impossible, such as sports, arts and gaming.

programme.title: CNN Newsroom
programme.desc: CNN Newroom provides the most up to date news as it breaks and is the longest running show on the channel, airing twice a day Monday to Friday and throughout the day over the weekends. CNN has developed a lot since its founding in 1980 by American media proprietor Ted Turner as a 24 hour cable news channel. As an organisation, CNN have won multiple awards, including a network-record six news and documentary Emmy Awards in 2018.

programme.title: Quests World of Wonder
programme.desc: Join our host, Richard Quest, as he takes us on a journey of discovery to some of the most iconic cities on the planet. Richard encounters many of the influential local inhabitants and delves into the heritage and culture of each city to reveal what makes them unique and fascinating. The first series sees Richard travel around the globe to visit Washington D.C. and explore the awesome power that resides in the city; in Panama City, Richard searchess for some of the legendary figures who shaped its identity; the vibrancy of Nairobi excites the imagination while Athens treis to sustain its legacy in the modern world; multi-cultural London reveals its elegant and martial history and the people of Berlin enahnce its attractions; and the exotic and singular atmosphere of Istanbul delights the senses.

programme.title: African Voices Changemakers
programme.desc: African Voices: Change makers is a CNN programme that focuses on some of Africas brightest and most brilliant change makers as they engineer innovative solutions or beneficial changes that will positively impact their communities. programme.title: Inside Africa
programme.desc: Each week, Inside Africa documentary series on CNN highlights the unique diversity of mysterious Africa, its numerous cultures and religions, peoples, art, music, cuisine, travel and literature, its one-of-a-kind flora and fauna. Watch the interviews with people from various spheres of life and find out more surprising facts about this continent: how it fights for conservation of rare animals, who the new figures in fashion and design are, what the new educational programs for children look like. Everything what Africa is filled with and lives for is in this series.

programme.title: Marketplace Africa
programme.desc: Unique access to the latest African market information, with a look at events and developments that impact its business world. Follow the business stories that influence the African continent. Eleni Giokos is a CNN correspondent based in the networks Johannesburg bureau and the shows host. Every week she interviews figures of business and industry to reveal the economic trends in various regions of Africa and to present the continents key sectors and corporations.

programme.title: CNN Marketplace Europe
programme.desc: We hit the red carpet for a look at the state of Europes film industry, from Venice to London. In the face of economic uncertainty and rising tariffs, how will the creative industry respond? As countries like Italy and the UK replace Hollywood as the go-to destinations for on-location shooting, we speak to some of the major players in the industry to find out how Europe has catapulted itself forward, and whether it can stay at the front of the pack.

programme.title: Inside Politics
programme.desc: Inside Politics is a political talk show, broadcast on CNN and anchored by CNN Chief National Correspondent John King. It features the most important political stories presented by a panel of well-sourced reporters. John King is an experienced reporter who covers the White House, Congress and the campaign trail, and interviews presidents, politicians and voters.

programme.title: U.S. State of the Union Address
programme.desc: The Speech is addressed to the Congress and the American people. It aims to highlight administration work and its victories, target political enemies and demonstrate the Presidents vision for the whole country.

programme.title: Fareed Zakaria GPS
programme.desc: Weekly public affairs show hosted by an American journalist, political scientist, and author Fareed Zakaria. The show is broadcasted on CNN every Sunday in many countries of the world. The "GPS" in the shows title stands for "Global Public Square," a reference to the shows focus on international issues and foreign affairs. The guests of the shows one-on-one interviews and roundtable discussions are most prominent figures in the world of global politics, economy and global decision-makers and influencers.

The show is broadcasted on CNN every Sunday in many countries of the world. The "GPS" in the shows title stands for "Global Public Square," a reference to the shows focus on international issues and foreign affairs. The guests of the shows one-on-one interviews and roundtable discussions are most prominent figures in the world of global politics, economy and global decision-makers and influencers.

programme.desc: Tune in and follow all the matches from the FIBA Asia Cup, an exciting basketball tournament in which compete mens national teams of Asia and Oceania. The tournament was founded in 1960, it has undergone several changes since then, and now it takes place every four years.

programme.title: FIBA Āzijas kauss. Jordānija - Irāna
programme.desc: Tune in and follow all the matches from the FIBA Asia Cup, an exciting basketball tournament in which compete mens national teams of Asia and Oceania. The tournament was founded in 1960, it has undergone several changes since then, and now it takes place every four years.

programme.title: High Speed Chase
programme.desc: A man takes control of an 18-wheeler semi-truck while holding his wife at knifepoint. US Marshals arrest a suspect wanted for the murder of his girlfriend.

programme.title: Edge of Alaska
programme.desc: McCarthy, Alaska is home to a rugged bunch of mavericks and risk takers, willing to brave the brutal conditions in this icy, isolated town. Once a thriving, prosperous place due to the gold rush, the town is now home to a mere 40 people. There is a juxtaposition between residents; while some believe in a traditional way of life, others are desperate to drag McCarthy into the modern age, believing this is the only way to ensure its survival. Edge of Alaska tells the story of this community at a crossroads.

programme.title: Salvage Hunters: The Restorers
programme.desc: Expert craftsmen are bringing Drew Pritchards finds back to life and restore them to their former glory. Drew hunts for treasures such as derelict gems and forgotten remnants across the country. And then he and his team do the restoration turning trash to gold, so that worn objects become shining gems for which Drews customers want to pay a lot of money. All kinds of items can and will be restored, starting from a century-old suitcase to an ancient coffee machine, from a ravaged carousel horse to a large railway clock.

programme.title: Diesel Brothers
programme.desc: Unique American reality series that follows a group of friends in Utah- David Heavy D Sparks, David Diesel Dave Kiley, and their crew at DieselSellerz who sell parts for diesel trucks and jeeps, repair and customize pickup trucks. They design and build some of the biggest and most amazing diesel powered vehicles you will ever see, and also do truck giveaways. Watch as they create these awesome masterpieces and enjoy all the crazy adventures they get into while doing it.

programme.title: Road Rage
programme.desc: Drivers witness acrobatic crashes. An aggressive driver faces a big problem. A motorist dodges a bullet. An angry driver follows a woman home.

programme.title: Road Rage
programme.desc: A furious driver takes out his anger on another car. Motorcyclists deal with aggressive drivers. A biker faces off with a bat-wielding man.

programme.title: Border Control Italia
programme.desc: Follows the officers of the Security and Customs Services at the borders of Italy, which are under the constant threat from drugs, weapons, and suspected terrorists.

programme.title: Wheeler Dealers
programme.desc: Buy, repair and restore and then resell a classic car in order to make profit- this is what Wheeler Dealers is about. The budget is limited, though you can see some exclusive and rare cars. Mike Brewer, a British dealer chooses the car carefully and hands it over to the mechanic, first Edd China, later Ant Anstead to be fixed and upgraded. The hosts are real masters of their trade, it seems they can bring life even to a piece of metal. It does not matter if you are a life-long car enthusiast or do not even have a driving license you will admire the results of hard work from the beginning to the end of the long uneasy restoring process.

programme.title: Salvage Hunters: Classic Cars
programme.desc: Drew Pritchard and Paul Cowland travel across the United Kingdom to uncover classic cars to buy, restore and sell on for a profit. The pair scour garages, barns and facilities to discover collectible cars which include the likes of the Morris Minor Traveller, Jaguar XJS, Rover P6 and a BMW 635 CSI among many others. The combination of Drews expertise of negotiation and deal-making and Pauls extensive mechanical knowledge makes them a formidable team ready to tackle anything challenging that comes their way.

programme.title: How Its Made
programme.desc: Have you ever wondered how things that surround us every day are produced? Find out about the whole process from the beginning to the end in a documentary television series How Its Made. The series demonstrates how various items like clothing and accessories, food, industrial products, cars, musical instruments and many more are manufactured. Who would have thought how exciting it would be to watch a cupcake, formula 1 race car or gummy vitamins being made?

programme.title: American Chopper
programme.desc: American Chopper is an American reality television series that revolves around the Teutuls- Paul Senior, his sons Paul Junior and Michael who work together at Orange County Choppers, a custom motorcycle fabrication company located in Montgomery, New York. The series is a mix of competition and drama, famous for real fighting, cursing, crying, welding, and painting. Its indisputable that each Teutul is a gifted mechanic, engineer and designer, they put together a motorbike in front of the viewers and make every customers wish come true.

programme.title: The Autobahn A2
programme.desc: One of Europes busiest, most dangerous and most important highways. For many people its their place of work, and many more use it to travel across Europe.

programme.title: The Autobahn A2
programme.desc: One of Europes busiest, most dangerous and most important highways. For many people its their place of work, and many more use it to travel across Europe.

programme.title: Steel Buddies
programme.desc: Michael Manousakis is a certified petrol head, but with a fondness for more than just the ordinary car. Manousakis is the owner of Morlock Motors, a mechanic yard operating out of Peterslahr, Germany. Alongside his team of experts, he buys, repairs and sells disused and beaten-up US army vehicles, distributing them back around the world to a wide array of eager customers. Whether its helping a British expat move a Centurion tank home, driving amphibious vehicles on the river Rhine or taking to the skies in age-old aeroplanes, Michael Manousakis enjoys adventuring out in these old military vehicles as much as he does repairing them.

programme.title: 100 Days Wild
programme.desc: The brute harshness of Alaskas wilderness is no joke, with hostile weather and dangerous animals constantly lurking on the horizon. In this documentary series, a group of seven strangers give up their creature comforts to build a self-sustaining community along the Tanana River, and they have 100 days before the biting chill of winter arrives. They must quickly learn to work as a team if their makeshift community is going to work, learning to hunt, gather and implement basic structures that will keep them dry and warm. Will they be able to handle the wilderness?

programme.title: 100 Days Wild

programme.title: Gold Rush
programme.desc: Gold Rush is a reality television series that follows the placer gold mining efforts of various family-run mining companies in boundless north of America. The series focuses on the work process in the conditions of permafrost and working relations between the participants. The show has 10 seasons altogether. In some episodes participants start the adventure and travel to Alaska to search for gold because of financial issues. They do not have any previous experience and have to learn on the job. Then there appears several gold mining teams that compete with each other. In some episodes the teams move to South America. Admire the courage and determination of the team members in their unstoppable desire to become rich.

programme.title: Gold Rush

programme.title: Dive Wars Australia
programme.desc: A fascinating look at the work of daring individuals who hunt for abalone in some of the worlds most dangerous and hostile waters. The crews face harsh conditions of the unpredictable waters as the hunting season starts, trying to catch as much abalone as possible.

programme.title: Expedition Unknown
programme.desc: American archaeologist, author and explorer Josh Gates explores the world to solve longstanding mysteries and legends that are yet to be solved. With no story too big, Josh travels across the globe to identify clues and secrets that could help him find the truth. First he must gather as much information about the case, before jetting off to pursue his leads. Whether its uncovering long lost Nazi treasures, unearthing the birth place of Jesus, deciphering the origin of Stonehenge or investigating the Vikings rise to power, Josh leaves no stone unturned in his quest for answers.

programme.title: Expedition X
programme.desc: Join our hosts, adventurer Josh Gates, scientist Phil Torres and paranormal researcher Jessica Chobot, as they travel around the planet uncovering the secrets behind supernatural phenomena, mythical beasts and alien activity. Each trip leads the team on a quest to reveal the bizarre truth of these fascinating stories. Epsiodes include a journey deep into the Cambodian jungle to search for a monster from a lost city; a spelunking expedition sees the team investigating the largest cave system in the world; an active volcano in Washington state might hold the clue to some extraterrestrial mysteries; and an exploration of a haunted dwelling in the Amazon causes panic in the middle of the night.

programme.title: NASAs Unexplained Files
programme.desc: What do we really know about life beyond the realm of our planet? Disturbing discoveries about the rest of our universe have perplexed scientists, and the rest of the world, for as long as we can remember. Now, the files and discoveries of one of the worlds biggest independent agencies have been dug up, for thorough investigation. Each episode scrutinises questionable evidence, encounters and sightings, to shed some light on the unexplained files of NASA. Featuring testimonies of NASA insiders and scientists who have first hand experience of the enigmas, laying within our universe.

programme.title: Survival instinct
programme.desc: Each week, a new pair of total strangers are faced with the ultimate survival challenge: survive for 21 days together with no clothes or supplies in some of the most dangerous environments in the world. In addition to the landscape itself working against the duo, the local wildlife stalk them as well. Of course, the biggest complication for any of the couples might end up being their own clashing egos. Will they make it out alive, or will they fall victim to the wilderness? They must fall back on their most primal instincts to ensure they dont become prey themselves.

programme.title: Survival instinct

programme.title: Junkyard Empire
programme.desc: The Cohen family have run their Junkyard Empire for years and see junk as an opportunity to create something and turn into cash. Whether it is a smashed up vehicle or an old rusty one or an overrun engine Andy, the son, will fix it up or strip it down and turn some of the worst shape cars and trucks into money. Andy owns automotive service shop and used car dealership. Bobby, his father who started the junkyard nearly 50 years ago, in most cases has opposite points of view about how Andy runs things.

programme.title: Salvage Hunters
programme.desc: Meet modern-day treasure hunter Drew Pritchard. With demanding customers, high turnover, and one of the biggest decorative salvage yards in the UK, Drew is constantly on the road, crisscrossing the country in search of derelict gems and forgotten remnants. Drew loves the thrill of the hunt and while he gets his hands dirty in the countrys architectural backwaters, his team of restorers is back at the shop giving old and rare finds a new lease on life!

programme.title: Baggage Battles
programme.desc: Featuring professional buyers including antique dealers, a production designer and an eCommerce expert, these expert buyers travel around the world to lost baggage auctions, estate auctions and police auctions to find the hidden treasure and items left behind or siezed by customs in order to make the greatest profit. This American docu-reality series created by The Travel Channel in 2012. Finding contents in baggage such as a bronze sculpture, jewellery including 18 karat gold and a legendary belt, these professionals prove why they have a name for themselves in their industry, finding hidden gems in hidden places.

programme.title: Shed And Buried: Classic Cars
programme.desc: In Leicestershire, Henry and Fuzz explore a shed full of classics, selecting a 1970s VW Beetle Beach Buggy. Can they restore it in time for a Somerset beach ride?

programme.title: Treehouse Masters
programme.desc: Treehouse Masters is an American reality television series hosted by Pete Nelson, a treehouse builder. Pete and his team design and build all types of treehouses for clients across the country. The clients and Petes team are the people who never stop dreaming. Youll be surprised to know how many people want to get away from the noisy comfortable cities and live in close communion with mother nature. So getting a treehouse is their chance to live a dream. Every episode will amaze you because of Petes talent and incredible imagination. He can build any type of a treehouse, starting from a small simple ones to most complex residences with all modern communication. Every wish of a customer will be heard and fulfilled.

programme.title: Farmhouse Fixer
programme.desc: Singer Jonathan Knight demonstrates his renovation know-how skills. He has renovated more than 200 houses, while preserving their original craftsmanship. He has been in this for more than 25 years, and thanks to his passion and talent he updates interiors while keeping the historical charm and chic.

programme.title: Flippin RVs
programme.desc: Midnight in the Oasis. Justin and Anna trek to Seattle to buy a rundown 1958 Oasis trailer from Justins brother. What should be an easy flip goes awry when they discover the Oasis is in need of a complete renovation.

programme.title: Tiny House Hunters
programme.desc: Reality series showing American house hunters who are considering joining the tiny-house revolution where people are choosing to live in smaller homes - often less than 55 square metres -and praising their benefits. In this property series realtors present three petite houses to prospective buyers. Some of the homes would be used as permanent residences whilst others could be a retreat to escape to. There are various reasons for the trend for tiny-living; some people are doing it for financial reasons, others are trying to live more ecologically and some yearn for a simpler lifestyle. When the potential tiny-homeowners are faced with the practical limitations of the properties on offer will they take the plunge and embrace the joys of tiny living? Or will they change their minds for more spacious accommodation?

In this property series realtors present three petite houses to prospective buyers. Some of the homes would be used as permanent residences whilst others could be a retreat to escape to. There are various reasons for the trend for tiny-living; some people are doing it for financial reasons, others are trying to live more ecologically and some yearn for a simpler lifestyle. When the potential tiny-homeowners are faced with the practical limitations of the properties on offer will they take the plunge and embrace the joys of tiny living? Or will they change their minds for more spacious accommodation?

programme.title: Renovation Impossible
programme.desc: A couple has too-ambitious dreams for their new house. With some big compromises and a creative design plan, Russell creates their perfect forever home.

programme.title: Animals on Drugs
programme.desc: In a meth hotspot, drugs fuel aggressive alligators. Forrest Galante investigates and attempts to rehabilitate a "meth gator."

programme.title: Finding Escobars Millions
programme.desc: Finding Escobars Millions is a documentary series revolving around one of the most notorious figures- Pablo Escobar, the boss of the Medellin cartel. They say he was worth around $100 billion and that a large amount of it has been buried somewhere in Colombia. Ex-CIA agents, their expert team and the original DEA agents go on a search throughout Colombia to see what they can find. Their mission is epic, they want to return the money to the Colombian people and government.

programme.title: Finding Escobars Millions
programme.desc: Finding Escobars Millions is a documentary series revolving around one of the most notorious figures- Pablo Escobar, the boss of the Medellin cartel. They say he was worth around $100 billion and that a large amount of it has been buried somewhere in Colombia. Ex-CIA agents, their expert team and the original DEA agents go on a search throughout Colombia to see what they can find. Their mission is epic, they want to return the money to the Colombian people and government.

programme.title: Border Control Poland
programme.desc: Security and Customs are working hard on the border of Poland constantly trying to prevent illegal items from entering the country. They are on the 24/7 watch detecting crimes and preventing them from happening. Dogs are great helpers when it comes to sniffing up hidden contraband.

programme.title: Border Control Italia
programme.desc: Follows the officers of the Security and Customs Services at the borders of Italy, which are under the constant threat from drugs, weapons, and suspected terrorists.

programme.title: Gold Rush
programme.desc: Gold Rush is a reality television series that follows the placer gold mining efforts of various family-run mining companies in boundless north of America. The series focuses on the work process in the conditions of permafrost and working relations between the participants. The show has 10 seasons altogether. In some episodes participants start the adventure and travel to Alaska to search for gold because of financial issues. They do not have any previous experience and have to learn on the job. Then there appears several gold mining teams that compete with each other. In some episodes the teams move to South America. Admire the courage and determination of the team members in their unstoppable desire to become rich.

programme.title: Gold Rush
programme.desc: Gold Rush is a reality television series that follows the placer gold mining efforts of various family-run mining companies in boundless north of America. The series focuses on the work process in the conditions of permafrost and working relations between the participants. The show has 10 seasons altogether.
