Then there appears several gold mining teams that compete with each other. In some episodes the teams move to South America. Admire the courage and determination of the team members in their unstoppable desire to become rich.

programme.title: Animals on Drugs
programme.desc: In a meth hotspot, drugs fuel aggressive alligators. Forrest Galante investigates and attempts to rehabilitate a "meth gator."

programme.title: Race of Life
programme.desc: Predator versus prey: in this instalment we analyze three attack-escape scenarios involving bird predators and their prey. One is the climbing flight escape, another is horizontal speeding, and thirdly, there is turning and diving to avoid capture. Predator and prey attack-escape behaviour is another outcome of the evolutionary arms race. There is something about birds of prey that make us pay attention - maybe it is the inherent fear we all have that one will attack us - or perhaps it is just because they are seldom seen by most westerners. Regardless, birds of prey are fascinating and in this episode we examine of some of the largest, mightiest and most spectacular raptors from around the world. Well watch with fascination the Eagle, a large bird of prey that is a skilled hunter and highly efficient killer. These elegant predators do their best work in large open spaces, where they can fly high and see for miles and miles. Meanwhile, the fastest living animal on land, sea or sky is also a bird of prey. The peregrine falcon can be found from the arctic to the tropics, and for centuries has been a symbol of prestige. At the other end of the scale is a bird that strips a carcass to down to its skeleton in search of a meal. The presence of a vulture is often seen as a sign of impending doom. But its a case of whatever gets you through: the vulture too, is just trying to stay one step ahead, in the race of life.

programme.title: Speed Kills
programme.desc: Desert creatures endure searing heat and zero rainfall, but speed is their ticket to survival.A Tiger beetle runs at the human equivalent of 500 miles per hour. A caracal jumps six feet to swat a weaverbird out of midair. And the worlds fastest chameleon hunts on the desert floor.Only the hardiest, fastest animals survive. Nothing else stands a chance.

programme.title: A Dogs Life
programme.desc: A Dogs Life explores the widely assumed facts that may actually be based on faulty and out-dated research. Ingenious experiments and meticulous observation reveal that the problems dogs solve best are those that involve interacting with humans. A fascinating and fun documentary that gives us a dogs eye view on the world.

programme.title: Deep Blue Dive
programme.desc: This film follows four Oxford University students as they embark on an epic, unsupported journey across the island of Svalbard, a deserted and barren icy wilderness in the north of Scandinavia. Their goal is to successfully retrace an expedition carried out nearly a century earlier. In 1923, four Oxford university predecessors had completed the arduous crossing. The team included the legendary Sandy Irvine, who famously partnered George Mallory a year later in a doomed attempt to become the first to climb Mount Everest. To this day, it remains a mystery whether they actually made it to the summit. Hundreds of hours of intense training and meticulous preparation are needed for such an expedition. They must learn how to deal with the dangers of polar bears and survive the freezing temperatures and the threat of prolonged storms. A key objective is to use a drone to document their arduous crossing of the ice and to carry out valuable scientific research into how global warming is affecting the glaciers of Svalbard, previously known as Spitsbergen (which means jagged mountains). Their expedition starts ominously as their boat journey to the first location at Duym Point faces heaving, mountainous seas which threaten the entire trip. Once ashore, each member has to pull 80 kilogramme sledges across the ice, carrying all of their supplies, climbing equipment, cameras, solar panels and tents. Spectacular drone footage reveals Svalbards dramatic icy landscape as never before. The drone is also used to map one of the larger glaciers to see exactly how much it has shrunk due to global warming. They are able to compare this glacier to a photograph taken on the 1923 expedition. The results are startling. Along the way, the team come across historical traces of the 1923 expedition, including wooden tent pegs and rusted tins which once contained Oxo stock cubes donated by a sponsor. At times, the Arctic weather proves their greatest enemy. For days on end, they endure violent winds of over 100 kilometres per hour which force the team to build a survival shelter in which they huddle together for warmth. In all, it takes 32 days of guts and determination to cross the archipelago, but the trip is a resounding success. One team member, Jamie Gardiner, tragically died the following year while on a climb in Norway. This film is dedicated to his memory.

programme.title: Mongolia, Steppes Emirate
programme.desc: Battered by strong winds, and seen as a grazing land, Mongolia is the kingdom of steppes. With important mineral resources such as copper or uranium, coal and rare soil, Mongolia future is secure: the economy shows a significant growth rate and it is a business paradise for some expatriates. But for most of the population, needs remain unfulfilled.

programme.title: Herding Sheep In Iceland
programme.desc: Starting at the beginning of September, the Northern Lights unveil their magical patterns on Icelands starry skies. At the same time, Icelanders celebrate the "Retir": sheep and horses are herded to the lowlands. 4,500 sheep and 800 horses spend 3 to 4 months in the untamed highlands. Now, they are rounded up. No single farmer can herd so many animals to the lowlands. The entire community helps.

programme.title: What In the World
programme.desc: Timber is one of this countrys biggest natural resources and the source of great potential wealth. Hence the existence of wholesale illegal logging, irrespective of the consequences to the local environment. This has led concerned parties to set up the Olancho Environmental Movement. This organization has mobilized to protect these forests, at some risk to its members, like Rene Gradiz, whose testimony is disturbing in the extreme.

programme.title: Music Voyager
programme.desc: When visiting Tokyo, it does not take long to realize "youre not in Kansas anymore". The massive metropolis offer a feast for the senses: blinding neon, the bleeps and blips of Pachinko parlors, adventurous cuisine and music that is experimental, animated, and sometimes, just plain unusual. On this episode of Music Voyager we get a taste of the cultural umami that is Tokyo, and it is voyage of discovery filled with surprises you will never forget. From the outlandish fashion of J - Pop, the surprising pastime of a Japanese jazz giant, Tokyos rock guitar superstar and a humorous hip - hop freestyler, we meet the colorful characters that make Tokyo one of the worlds greatest cities. Our journey is powered by ample bowls of delicio us ramen noodles, first - class shots of sake and the occasional octopus ball.

programme.title: Music Voyager
programme.desc: Music Voyager is a music and travel broadcast series (television/cable, broadband, in-flight and mobile) that invites viewers to discover the exciting sounds of the planet. The host is Jacob Edgar, an explorer who does not search for lost cities or ancient ruins. Hes on the quest for a different kind of treasure…music. As an ethnomusicologist and world music record producer, Edgar travels the globe hunting for the best songs the world has to offer, and he suffers through some of the worst…so you dont have to. Along the way, hes rewarded with a backstage pass to concert halls, street festivals, recording studios and rehearsal rooms. With local musicians as his guide, Edgar tastes exotic and occasionally ghastly food, visits off-the-beaten path attractions and parties the night away to amazing concerts at hidden venues that only the locals know. Join music voyager for unexpected adventures and surprising discoveries that unveil the magic, mystery and music of far off lands.

programme.title: Close Quarter Battle
programme.desc: The practice of hiring private armies goes back to ancient times, and the mystique associated with the mercenary warrior has been the subject of many historical studies and ﬁ ctional characterizations. This episode of CQB takes a more contemporary look at a day in the life of a group of civilian contractors, and how their role has evolved on the modern battleﬁ eld. Using its "sub-second" analysis techniques and intimate ﬁrst-person footage, CQB reveals the backgrounds, training and equipment of todays "soldiers for hire" and how private armies are re-shaping the way conﬂ icts are conducted around the world.

programme.title: What In the World
programme.desc: Presented by Peadar King, this series illustrates the human consequences of global economic inequalities and human rights violations, by focusing on how people encounter these issues on a daily basis. At the heart of Africa, the Congo for many people will always be associated with Joseph Conrads early twentieth-century novel the Heart of Darkness, a title that has become a by-word for the country. And for Benjamin and David, two former child soldiers, and Funaha held as a sex slave by one of the many militias that continue to terrorise the country, that metaphor remains a daily reality. The film explores how this seemingly never-ending conflict impacts on the people of North Kivu.

programme.title: The Past Hunters
programme.desc: Built in 1861 Mill Street Barracks is steeped in rich history. It has accommodated many branches of the armed forces throughout its life. Like many other barracks it has also been used as a morgue making it a prime location for the supernatural.

programme.title: The Past Hunters
programme.desc: Derek Acorahs The Past Hunters travel to Knutsford and investigate a former Crown Court. Multiple people have been sentenced to death and life in prison, but will the team encounter any of its former inmates tonight?

programme.title: Rip Files
programme.desc: The R.I.P. Files features a group of paranormal investigators, who use intuitive abilities and a deep knowledge of metaphysical techniques to interact with the entities they encounter at haunted locations. They encourage the spirits to share their stories in their own words through amazing EVPs and other evidence that is bridging the gap between the worlds of science and spirituality.

programme.title: Rip Files
programme.desc: The R.I.P. Files features a group of paranormal investigators, who use intuitive abilities and a deep knowledge of metaphysical techniques to interact with the entities they encounter at haunted locations. They encourage the spirits to share their stories in their own words through amazing EVPs and other evidence that is bridging the gap between the worlds of science and spirituality.

programme.title: Travel Thru History
programme.desc: In this episode we explore Las Vegas lesser known past. We visit the National Atomic Testing museum to learn about how the desert outside of Vegas was used for testing Americas secret nuclear weapons. We also visit the Mormon Fort, the first permanent non-native settlement in the area, as well as the Neon Museum.

programme.title: Journeys in Africa
programme.desc: South Africa has many different tribal groups and ethnic people, but none have a more fascinating story than the Zulu. These were once the most feared warriors in all of Africa and they have fiercely held onto that culture. Theyre also dedicated conservationists and we see first-hand the wildlife sanctuaries theyve created. This is a proud people with a unique history, and we get to share that with them.

programme.title: Journeys in Africa
programme.desc: Host Bill Ball begins the ascent of the highest mountain in Africa. Trouble almost immediately affects the team as the cameraman suffers from fatigue and altitude sickness. Just over halfway, the trip is in serious doubt as altitude, cold and wind force the team to evaluate their fitness to continue.

programme.title: Around the World in 80 Islands
programme.desc: Adventures in Tanzania. On board of a little Cessna plane, we reach the Songo Songo archipelago, 50 km south from Mafia. Its from here that, after 30 minutes of navigation, we arrive in our final destination: Fan Jove, an island in the middle of nowhere, once inhabited by sea nomads and today the realm of an eco-lodge. Surrounded by a 11km reef rich in fishes, birds and a lighthouse built by the Germans in 1894, Fan Jove is a real paradise in the middle of the Indian Ocean, that Malcolm Italian biologist who loves Africa, wants to show us in every magical detail.

programme.title: Around the World in 80 Islands
programme.desc: Were in Messinia, looking out over the Mediterranean Sea. Here we find the beautiful Navarino Coast, with its rich vegetation, historically important archeological sites and breath-taking beaches. With its rich variety of flora and fauna, the Navarino Coast is a small eco-friendly paradise, but it is also the ideal place for scientific research. In the waters surrounding Sfaktiria Island, we manage to see the Loggerhead sea turtle, now in danger of extinction. Afterwards on dry land, we then get to go and discover another important heritage of this region: the culinary tradition, with its typical dishes, such as " Hylopites", and the famous Greek coffee.

programme.title: Travel Thru History
programme.desc: This country music Mecca has a plethora of American history to explore. Well stand on the stage of the Grand Ole Opry, visit the home of the 7th US President Andrew Jackson, and visit the largest recreation of the Parthenon outside of Greece.

programme.title: Travel Thru History
programme.desc: Well find out why they called Minneapolis the "Mill City" when we visit the Mill City Museum. Then we march over to the Unions Fort Snelling, the first permanent structure in Minnesota, and then head underground and learn about St. Pauls organized crime hide outs.

programme.title: Out Of Town Adventures
programme.desc: Outta Town Adventures travels both near and far to discover the best advenures the destinations have to offer. Season 1 visits attractions from California to Rwanda, Switzerland, Iceland, Utah, Zambia, Mexico, The Grand Canyon, Georgia (the Eastern European one) Louisiana, Hawaii, Mauritius and Seychelles. This TV series is dedicated to presenting history, culture and geography in a fun and pisitive way. It encourages people to explore this beautiful world - something that starts with simply getting out of town!

programme.title: Out Of Town Adventures
programme.desc: Outta Town Adventures travels both near and far to discover the best advenures the destinations have to offer. Season 1 visits attractions from California to Rwanda, Switzerland, Iceland, Utah, Zambia, Mexico, The Grand Canyon, Georgia (the Eastern European one) Louisiana, Hawaii, Mauritius and Seychelles. This TV series is dedicated to presenting history, culture and geography in a fun and pisitive way. It encourages people to explore this beautiful world - something that starts with simply getting out of town!

programme.title: Show Me Where You Live
programme.desc: Show me where you live is a documentary series that aims to answer the following question: How can human beings claim ownership to a space so that they can live safely within it, function as a society, and above all be in harmony with the environment around them? As we discover cultures and emblematic populations, we follow Philippe Simay who is at the heart of Inhabiting the World and represents its identity and originality. Philippe takes us on an epic adventure around the Human Habitat and sets the tone for the journey. As a humanist and philosopher, Philippe is a tireless surveyor of the city, and an explorer of living spaces. Determined to travel around the world, Philippe unveils how the populations that he encounters claim the space they occupy, shapes it and adjust to it. In this series of 20 films, of 26 minutes each, the habitat will be a major showcase revealing our capacity to adapt ourselves at a time where we need to find solutions in order to address immense changes.

programme.title: Show Me Where You Live
programme.desc: Show me where you live is a documentary series that aims to answer the following question: How can human beings claim ownership to a space so that they can live safely within it, function as a society, and above all be in harmony with the environment around them? As we discover cultures and emblematic populations, we follow Philippe Simay who is at the heart of Inhabiting the World and represents its identity and originality. Philippe takes us on an epic adventure around the Human Habitat and sets the tone for the journey. As a humanist and philosopher, Philippe is a tireless surveyor of the city, and an explorer of living spaces. Determined to travel around the world, Philippe unveils how the populations that he encounters claim the space they occupy, shapes it and adjust to it. In this series of 20 films, of 26 minutes each, the habitat will be a major showcase revealing our capacity to adapt ourselves at a time where we need to find solutions in order to address immense changes.

programme.title: New Frontier
programme.desc: It powers the machinery of nature; our weather, encourages and sustains life on land and at sea. When it sets in the West it reveals to us its many billions of sibling stars populating the night sky. We study our Sun closely, and like a Rosetta stone it can reveal the secrets of all the other stars above.

programme.title: New Frontier
programme.desc: As scientists and astronomers peer closer at nearby stars with ever more fidelity they are discovering planets; exo planets, worlds outside our own solar system. With technological advances and improved techniques scientists are discovering more and more worlds every day. With confidence scientists now calculated there could be as many as 40 billion Earth like planets in our Milky Way galaxy alone.

programme.title: On the Cities Rooftops
programme.desc: How is life on the citys roofs? This series scales new heights, exploring apartment buildings, towers and monuments to discover a world full of unsuspected treasures : our rooftops. By day and night, the population changes on these heights. There are people who work here, people who live here, and others who come here to relax. The worlds rooftops are a continual hive of activity…

programme.title: On the Cities Rooftops
programme.desc: How is life on the citys roofs? This series scales new heights, exploring apartment buildings, towers and monuments to discover a world full of unsuspected treasures : our rooftops. By day and night, the population changes on these heights. There are people who work here, people who live here, and others who come here to relax. The worlds rooftops are a continual hive of activity…

programme.title: Wow, I Never Knew That!
programme.desc: Learn the secrets behind THERMOS amazing technology! And they were the sweet candy pellets we loved as a kid, but did you know that PEZ was created to help people stop smoking? And find out how a steamboat inspired SAMUEL LANGHORNE CLEMENS to change his name to MARK TWAIN!

programme.title: Wow, I Never Knew That!
programme.desc: Its cheesy and and eaten all over the world! Youll learn how DOMINICKS PIZZA became DOMINOS PIZZA . And we all know how going to a circus wouldnt be complete without fluffy sweet COTTON CANDY! Well explain how this feathery goodness SPUN to life! And all the spy action heroes use them, but where did the term GADGET really come from?

programme.title: Water: H2O Stories
programme.desc: Water: H2O Stories is a 3x52 series revisiting the story of water on planet Earth and its disrupted course over time which has led to the 21st century biggest challenge.

programme.title: Blue Realm
programme.desc: Filmed using crystal clear High Definition technology, The Blue Realm takes the viewer on a fascinating and breath-taking journey of discovery beneath the waves to examine the unique biology and extraordinary behaviour of undersea animals. Filmed by expert divers with a passion for marine life and environment, the compelling stories and captivating creatures come from many locations around the world including Papua New Guinea, Palau, South Africa, the Red Sea, the Great Barrier Reef, the Bahamas, Cocos Island, British Columbia, Texas, Indonesia, the Socorro Archipelago, California and Florida.

programme.title: Blue Realm
programme.desc: Filmed using crystal clear High Definition technology, The Blue Realm takes the viewer on a fascinating and breath-taking journey of discovery beneath the waves to examine the unique biology and extraordinary behaviour of undersea animals. Filmed by expert divers with a passion for marine life and environment, the compelling stories and captivating creatures come from many locations around the world including Papua New Guinea, Palau, South Africa, the Red Sea, the Great Barrier Reef, the Bahamas, Cocos Island, British Columbia, Texas, Indonesia, the Socorro Archipelago, California and Florida.

programme.title: Inside Outer Space
programme.desc: Come with us as we explore and unravel the mysteries of what lies beyond our planet Earth. This is a series packed with space stories and information about our universe covering what we can see, how we can live in space and what science tells us about the past and the future as we journey inside out of space.

programme.title: Inside Outer Space
programme.desc: Come with us as we explore and unravel the mysteries of what lies beyond our planet Earth. This is a series packed with space stories and information about our universe covering what we can see, how we can live in space and what science tells us about the past and the future as we journey inside out of space.

programme.title: A Year in the Wild
programme.desc: The middle of the year sees the Okavango Deltas channels flooded and waterholes filled to the brim, even though the rains already stopped around April. At 15.000km2 the Okavango Delta is the worlds largest inland delta with massive expanses of wetlands, but it cant compete with the size of Brazils Pantanal region. This is a wetland that sprawls over an area of at least 140.000km2, with 80% of its floodplains submerged during the rainy season. Coral reefs, too, support an extraordinarily colourful diversity of life, despite their home in nutrient-poor tropical waters. All too often, the inhabitants of neighbouring homes pick fights with each other over territory, food or mating rights. Coastal marsh crabs in the Seychelles are no exception, busily collecting white flowers and defending their prizes against the attentions of other crabs. Day-to-day survival is always hard work in the natural world, and clashes with neighbours are common. At this time of year, the buffalo herds of the Okavango Delta are in prime condition, following the months of plenty after the rainy season. For the Xakanaxa lion pride, they are the preferred prey item, and they are often found hard on the heels of the buffalo. Just as the individual lions in a single pride join forces to ensure the survival of the prides members, leafcutter ants also work together for the greater good of their colony. Their colonies are huge, numbering 3 to 8 million ants in a single nest, which can measure 15 metres across and 5 metres deep. Such large colonies require a lot of food, and supplying their precious fungus with enough plant material to grow means that within the tropical forests of South America, leaf cutter ants collectively consume almost 20% of the annual vegetation growth, making them the dominant herbivore around. For ragged-tooth sharks, it is time to congregate at the Aliwal Shoal off South Africas coastline. Up to 50 ragged-tooth sharks can be seen bunched together in underwater caves and under ledges, showing tell-tale signs of scars and aggressive altercations that indicate their mating season has started.

programme.title: Sarah Shark
programme.desc: Sarah travels to one of the top 10 dive destinations in Australia (Julian Rocks, Byron Bay, NSW) to dive with three species of Wobbegong Sharks within the Cape Byron Marine Park. She also conducts a street poll with members of the public to find out what they think about sharks.

programme.title: Sarah Shark
programme.desc: Sarah travels to one of the top 10 dive destinations in Australia (Julian Rocks, Byron Bay, NSW) to dive with three species of Wobbegong Sharks within the Cape Byron Marine Park. She also conducts a street poll with members of the public to find out what they think about sharks.

programme.title: Wild Australia with Ray Mears
programme.desc: Ray starts by hitching a lift on a research crane to get a birds eye view over the Rainforest; from there, he can see the geographical position responsible for this lush vegetation: mountain range in the west and the sea in the east. He then goes down to the ground, delving into the heart of the jungle, he comes across millennial trees, camouflage spiders and a miniature dinosaur, the Boyds Forest Dragon. He pursues his journey by travelling on a zipwire with wildlife expert, Justin McMahon. Together they observe life in the canopy. Meanwhile, Rays cameraman Martin Hayward Smith has been filming an animal that can only be found in this part of the world: the Bennetts tree kangaroo, a cute marsupial that lives like a monkey.

programme.title: Wild Australia with Ray Mears
programme.desc: Ray takes the Great Ocean Road along the Antarctic facing coast of Australia - the longest South facing coastline in the world. He starts in Port Philp Bay the entrance to Melbourne Harbour where for the first time he sees a strange marine creature - the weedy sea dragon - a relative of the sea horse. He also swims with a unique species of dolphin - the Burrunan Dolphins.Crossing the Bay he heads off down the longest War Memorial in the world - the Great Ocean Road and meets 93 year old Doug Stirling who remembers the world war 1 veterans building the road.Ray visits the Penguin Colony on Middle Island where guard dogs protect the penguins from foxes and he watches the night time return of the penguins after a day spent at sea fishing.He takes to the seas and discovers the creatures of the deep waters - albatross, balls of krill and a pod of fast moving common dolphins.

programme.title: Wild Australia with Ray Mears
programme.desc: In this episode, Ray explores the Red Centre of the country and shows that the Australian desert is filled with life for those who know where to find water.He arrives in the Red Centre by chopper as he flies over the Uluru monolith or Ayres Rock. For his first stop, he goes to a red kangaroo sanctuary where he cuddles a joey, meets their carer Brolga and gets close to the usually wary adult red kangaroos. He pursues his journey deeper in the desert to meet a local aboriginal Sammy Wilson. They go to a traditional waterhole and chat over a camp fire about Sammys ancestral knowledge of the land. Ray spends the night out under the stars before driving more inland to rocky areas where water collects. There Ray comes face to face with a wild kangaroo and rock wallabies. He then follows tracks along a dry river bed that lead him to Australias wild dog: a dingo.

programme.title: Animal Embassy
programme.desc: Hes known as the "Birdman of Loro Parque" and Rafa, the Loro Parque Foundation Scientific Director wears the badge with pride. Every day he surrounds himself with all things ornithological - from parrots and puffins to penguins. But its what hes carrying through the zoo that brings all the birds to the yard. Any guesses? Youve heard of the film "How to train your Dragon" - today Inaki has to try and train an anteater (and hes not sure whats proving easier)! With anteaters being the stubborn but sensitive types, Inakis digging deep into his bag of tricks - beginning with the old favourite, some vanilla yoghurt. Will Sue-Anne the anteater succumbs to Inakis tasty charms or will she thumb her (rather long) nose at him instead?

programme.title: Animal Embassy
programme.desc: Ubongo the gorilla has a massive cut on his foot. But how do you treat a 400-pound gorilla with a sore foot? Very carefully it seems. The Loro Parque veterinary team put all their skills to the test to tackle a problem with very, VERY big teeth. Youve heard of cattle farms and dairy farms - but what about a coral farm? Ester and her aquarium team take us behind the scenes of their newest attraction. But how will the public take to something thats not as cute and cuddly as their other exhibits? Have you ever seen a sloth take a shower? Not many people have. But when its summertime in Tenerife, the tourists arent the only ones looking to cool down. Hugo the sloth will draw back the shower curtain and reveal all...albeit verrrry slowly.

programme.title: Animal Doctors
programme.desc: Explore how animals developed over time and generations their own medicine and health care strategies. How have these been passed onto early humans ? Questioning traditional boundaries between human and animal, we will travel from Central African Republic, to Tanzania, from the US to France with the leading experts in animal behaviour. Todays science revisits the birth of animal intelligence and culture.

programme.title: Life in the Blue
programme.desc: This films reveals the extraordinary variety of life found in the vast blue expanses of te open ocean. Here, all the action takes place in a 10 metre deep band of water, just under the surface. Many species use this section of water to migrate and hunt while others use ingenious ways to stay hidden where there appears to be no shelter. From the surface, the huge blue expanses of the open ocean appear to be devoid of all life. Popular belief is that most sea life congregates around mainline coasts, islands or rocky outcrops. But that perception is far from the truth. This 4K film,shot in the Atlantic, reveals the extraordinary diversity of species who call the open ocean their home and the tactics they use to survive in the watery wilderness. Most of the life here congregates in a nutrient-rich band of water, around 10 metres from the surface. But it is brutal life out in the open ocean. There is little shelter, big predators abound and food is hard to find. Only those who adapt to the conditions have a hope of surviving in the blue void. Barracuda are a common species in the open water and they travel in large spiraling groups close the surface as a defense mechanism against bigger predators. This space is also their own feeding ground and they can attack smaller fish en masse. And where there are barracuda, Blue sharks are never far away. These supreme open ocean predators are among the most graceful of sharks but when the need arises, they can transform instantly into ferocious and efficient killers. They regularly cross the Atlantic, coast to coast, in a journey of 4,000 kilometres. Other species profiled which also undertake huge journeys include turtles, pilot whales and whale sharks, and we reveal how the notorious Portuguese man o war provides shelter for small fish within its lethal tentacles. Other small fish of prey instinctively group together when they are threatened - as lone individuals they are far more likely to be eaten than large groups. But in dramatic close up action, a banquet is served as dolphins sprint in from the blue to harvest this massive source of protein. The film also reveals the amazing variety of life and colour found in shipwrecks. Like oases in the desert,these steel skeletons are colonized by soft and hard corals, attracting huge armies of small fish. They hide in the structures while larger fish and sharks roam the periphery.

programme.title: Japanese Heights
programme.desc: There is more to Japans natural landscape than just Mount Fuji! Discover the countrys numerous mountains and the ethos of the people who live there. From mountains with eight peaks, mountain gods who keep locals in their awe to building snow monsters and embracing modern activities like skiing - this documentary shows the unseen side to Japan!

programme.title: Mongolia, Steppes Emirate
programme.desc: Battered by strong winds, and seen as a grazing land, Mongolia is the kingdom of steppes. With important mineral resources such as copper or uranium, coal and rare soil, Mongolia future is secure: the economy shows a significant growth rate and it is a business paradise for some expatriates. But for most of the population, needs remain unfulfilled.

programme.title: What In the World
programme.desc: Indris Seid Yimer and Emyet Assen Worakis lives have been utterly transformed in the last thirty years. In 1984, they, their families and their community were engulfed in famine and devastation, a famine memorably described by BBC journalist Michael Buerk as "the closest thing to hell on Earth". Set in the Wollo area, the epicentre of the 1984 famine, the film tells their story. Other contributions featured are from people like entrepreneur Samuel Alemu and financier Ermyas Amelga. It also showcases the hauntingly beautiful UNESCO World Heritage site in Lalibela.

programme.title: Music Voyager
programme.desc: Music Voyager is a music and travel broadcast series (television/cable, broadband, in-flight and mobile) that invites viewers to discover the exciting sounds of the planet. The host is Jacob Edgar, an explorer who does not search for lost cities or ancient ruins. Hes on the quest for a different kind of treasure…music. As an ethnomusicologist and world music record producer, Edgar travels the globe hunting for the best songs the world has to offer, and he suffers through some of the worst…so you dont have to. Along the way, hes rewarded with a backstage pass to concert halls, street festivals, recording studios and rehearsal rooms. With local musicians as his guide, Edgar tastes exotic and occasionally ghastly food, visits off-the-beaten path attractions and parties the night away to amazing concerts at hidden venues that only the locals know. Join music voyager for unexpected adventures and surprising discoveries that unveil the magic, mystery and music of far off lands.

programme.title: The Past Hunters
programme.desc: The Hack Green Secret Nuclear Bunker is a former government-owned nuclear bunker located at Hack Green, Cheshire, England. It Started as a decoy site for enemy bombers but later developed into a legitimate base. Now it is ripe with hauntings.

programme.title: Close Quarter Battle
programme.desc: From the elite ex-special forces personnel in charge of guarding heads of state in conﬂ ict zones to the two-person teams that protect CEOs in dangerous regions, modern-day bodyguards must be well versed in close quarter battle techniques. An immense amount of planning and preparation is involved in each operation. From air travel, car convoys and helicopter shuttles to basic foot traﬃc, a close protection squad must be completely tuned to the Who, What, Where and When of any given situation. This episode of CQB focuses on the complex day-to-day and minute-to-minute operations of these elite teams and the highly developed techniques they employ.

programme.title: What In the World
programme.desc: Presented by Peadar King, this series illustrates the human consequences of global economic inequalities and human rights violations, by focusing on how people encounter these issues on a daily basis. At the heart of Africa, the Congo for many people will always be associated with Joseph Conrads early twentieth-century novel the Heart of Darkness, a title that has become a by-word for the country. And for Benjamin and David, two former child soldiers, and Funaha held as a sex slave by one of the many militias that continue to terrorise the country, that metaphor remains a daily reality. The film explores how this seemingly never-ending conflict impacts on the people of North Kivu.

programme.title: The Past Hunters
programme.desc: Derek Acorahs The Past Hunters continue their investigation of Knutsford Crown Court. As they delve deeper into the building, will the ghosts and spirits make contact through Derek?

programme.title: Rip Files
programme.desc: The R.I.P. Files features a group of paranormal investigators, who use intuitive abilities and a deep knowledge of metaphysical techniques to interact with the entities they encounter at haunted locations. They encourage the spirits to share their stories in their own words through amazing EVPs and other evidence that is bridging the gap between the worlds of science and spirituality.

programme.title: Rip Files
programme.desc: The R.I.P. Files features a group of paranormal investigators, who use intuitive abilities and a deep knowledge of metaphysical techniques to interact with the entities they encounter at haunted locations. They encourage the spirits to share their stories in their own words through amazing EVPs and other evidence that is bridging the gap between the worlds of science and spirituality.

programme.title: Travel Thru History
programme.desc: Its island living in the Keys on this episode of TTH. We learn about the islands treasure hunting history at the Mel Fisher Museum. Then well explore Fort Jefferson, an isolated fort in the Gulf of Mexico that defended the islands. American literature enthusiasts will enjoy a look at Ernest Hemingways Key West home, where some of his most famous works were penned.

programme.title: Journeys in Africa
programme.desc: Host Bill Ball begins the ascent of the highest mountain in Africa. Trouble almost immediately affects the team as the cameraman suffers from fatigue and altitude sickness. Just over halfway, the trip is in serious doubt as altitude, cold and wind force the team to evaluate their fitness to continue.

programme.title: Journeys In Africa
programme.desc: One of the Seven Natural Wonders of the World—all other great wilderness areas are compared to this vast savannah. Wildlife numbers are awesome, but nothing like the numbers of the great migration. Journeys places you in the midst of this natural phenomenon where predator and prey are on a march for survival.

programme.title: Around the World in 80 Islands
programme.desc: Between the sea and the desert. Thats the fine line we travel on this trip to Egypt. To the south of Hurghada, on the Red Sea, there is a desert peninsula called Soma Bay, which were going to explore. We start with a fun quad bike safari, that takes us towards the arid and rocky hinterland. Finally we arrive at a Bedouin village, hidden among the mountains. We then return to the coast, in order to discover Soma Bays other side, made up of oasis and luxury. There, you can enjoy every benefit from the sea. For example, in the Thalassic spa, in the quiet and relaxed atmosphere, or in the Soma Bay Kite House, where active people can enjoy kitesurf. We also want to appreciate, in the best possible way, the outstanding beauty of this sea, so we dive down into its depths, to be among the star fish and corals, Butterfly fish and Moray eels, sea turtles and Clown fish.

programme.title: Around the World in 80 Islands
programme.desc: In the Messinia region of Greece, we find a place of unbelievable beauty, where man has been able to really work for the conservation and defense of the eco-system there. It is the Navarino Coast, where "eco sustainability" has become the key word at the heart of every human activity, from building design to the choice of construction materials, from the irrigation techniques for the golf course to the sports activities, from the culinary tradition to diving. The communion with nature is complete, and the body can benefit from it in many different ways: for example, through the physiotherapy treatments based on herbs, or with SUP yoga, which is practiced directly on a board in the sea.

programme.title: Travel Thru History
programme.desc: Americas military history is on display on the decks of the USS North Carolina. Then we visit the historic Confederate Fort Fisher civil war museum and learn about the Carolinas role in the civil war.

programme.title: Travel Thru History
programme.desc: San Antonio is rich with Texas, Mexican, and Spanish history. We make our last stand at the Alamo, and visit Missions National Historical Park. Lastly, we spelunk the Natural Bridge Caverns underground.

programme.title: Out Of Town Adventures
programme.desc: Outta Town Adventures travels both near and far to discover the best advenures the destinations have to offer. Season 1 visits attractions from California to Rwanda, Switzerland, Iceland, Utah, Zambia, Mexico, The Grand Canyon, Georgia (the Eastern European one) Louisiana, Hawaii, Mauritius and Seychelles. This TV series is dedicated to presenting history, culture and geography in a fun and pisitive way. It encourages people to explore this beautiful world - something that starts with simply getting out of town!

programme.title: Out Of Town Adventures

programme.title: Show Me Where You Live
programme.desc: Show me where you live is a documentary series that aims to answer the following question: How can human beings claim ownership to a space so that they can live safely within it, function as a society, and above all be in harmony with the environment around them? As we discover cultures and emblematic populations, we follow Philippe Simay who is at the heart of Inhabiting the World and represents its identity and originality. Philippe takes us on an epic adventure around the Human Habitat and sets the tone for the journey. As a humanist and philosopher, Philippe is a tireless surveyor of the city, and an explorer of living spaces. Determined to travel around the world, Philippe unveils how the populations that he encounters claim the space they occupy, shapes it and adjust to it. In this series of 20 films, of 26 minutes each, the habitat will be a major showcase revealing our capacity to adapt ourselves at a time where we need to find solutions in order to address immense changes.

programme.title: Travel Quest
programme.desc: Bill Ball breaks the rules and stereo types of travel shows as he ventures beyond the highlights. What do you do after youve lead groups to over 140 countries and all 7 continents? Welcome to Bills bucket list on steroids... Travel Quest. This new, fast-paced series chases Bill around the globe as he seeks out anything but the mundane and ordinary—coming face-to-face with the largest crocodiles in the world, snorkeling with thousands of jellyfish, walking on the rim of an exploding volcano, feeding a group of sharks without a cage, bicycling across the Serengeti... this is not your typical travel show!

programme.title: New Frontier
programme.desc: New satellites are being launched to continue detailed observations of Earth and its oceans an ice caps, They are finding that climate change is accelerating and they have the data to prove it.

programme.title: New Frontier
programme.desc: NASAS Parker Solar Probe Mission is on its way and will be shortly followed by Europes Solar probe Mission. No spacecraft have traveled so fast or so close to a star before. It is hoped to reveal the source of the solar winds that effect us here on Earth.

programme.title: Around the World in 80 Islands
programme.desc: On board of the strangest Cessna in the whole of Venezuela. Vittorio, a man who feels that his personal space is more in the air rather than on the round, is taking us from the North to the South, leaving from Gran Roque Island. We first fly over the Los Roques archipelago, to then land on a runway made of sand, on the island of La Tortuga, a long strip of land and sand that is inhabited only by a few fishermen. Flying again we follow the waterways of this region and re-fuel in Ciudad Bolivar, a city on the banks of the great Orinoco river, we then fly over the vast and savage territory of the Gran Sabana dominated by the Tepuy and the famous Canaima waterfall, until we reach our final destination: The Salto Angel, the highest waterfall in the world, which is named after its discoverer, the pilot Jimmy Angel, the idol of our friend Vittorio.

programme.title: Distant Shores
programme.desc: Series 9 of Distant Shores follows Paul and Sheryl Shard on a diverse voyage from England through the inland waterways of France to the Mediterranean Sea, an Atlantic crossing, and island-hopping in the Caribbean aboard their 49-foot sailboat, Distant Shores II. When they travel through France to arrive in the Med they sail to Gibraltar. From Gibraltar they enter the Atlantic Ocean stopping at the exotic port of Rabat on the west coast of Morocco, then head offshore to explore the Canary Islands before joining the Atlantic Rally for Cruisers (ARC) in Las Palmas for a 2,800 mile trans-atlantic passage to the Caribbean for Christmas celebrations.

programme.title: Distant Shores

programme.title: Of Boats And Men
programme.desc: Travelling by boat bears a priceless sense of Freedom and offers endless new vistas to all passengers. Across waterways around the world Boats are an essential tool of daily life whether they carry goods, serve as utilities or services in remote areas.

programme.title: New Frontier
programme.desc: Launching payloads into space is a very difficult task, historically rocket launches are the proverbial "swords into ploughshares" Missiles designed to carry atomic warheads now send satellites and probes into the solar system. Ironically its one of the few exploits Mankind undertakes that doesnt occur in nature.

programme.title: Nomads
programme.desc: Follow breathtaking travel adventures of some well known athletes of extreme sports. Have a look at some stunning locations in Alaska, Mexico, Argentina, Japan, Tahiti, Africa, Costa Rica, Norway, Hawaii and whitewater kayaking, extreme big mountain skiing, windsurfing, kiteboarding, extreme snowboarding and big wave surfing that push the limits of possibility. The focus is on compelling personalities and great storytelling.

programme.title: Water: H2O Stories
programme.desc: Water: H2O Stories is a 3x52 series revisiting the story of water on planet Earth and its disrupted course over time which has led to the 21st century biggest challenge.

programme.title: European Islands
programme.desc: Its called La Isla Bonita, meaning "the beautiful island", or also La Isla Verde -"the green island" - as it is the greenest of all the Canary Islands. Every few hundred meters, it offers an entirely different and unique view. From tropical cloud forests, to mountain panoramas and volcanic landscapes. La Palma is an incredibly diverse natural paradise. And that is precisely its greatest asset. La Palma is a place that everyone should visit.

programme.title: Desperate Hours
programme.desc: Volcanoes, earthquakes, tidal waves, and fires. Cataclysmic events that are capable of wiping out thousands of lives in a terribly short space of time. Then there are epidemics and pandemics, particularly chilling in their own way, because they literally and figuratively get under the skin. Lets not forget man-made disasters, the industrial accidents and environmental disasters that highlight all that is worst about our presence on this fragile blue green planet. And what is more frightening than a nuclear calamity? Accidents on the road, on rail, in the air and at sea, well, may not have quite the same deadly power as volcanoes or earthquakes; but they hold their own terrors, and are responsible for 1000s of fatalities every year. In this sobering yet thrilling final instalment of Desperate Hours we will take a look at some of the worst of the worst.

programme.title: Fragrance and Emotions
programme.desc: Unique documentary that takes you to discover the secret of some of the most luxurious perfumes and emblematic fragrances in the world. Visit the famous city of Grasse to meet the creators, the beautiful flower fields and all the incredible emotional powers of the Perfume.

programme.title: Wow, I Never Knew That!
programme.desc: Learn the secrets behind THERMOS amazing technology! And they were the sweet candy pellets we loved as a kid, but did you know that PEZ was created to help people stop smoking? And find out how a steamboat inspired SAMUEL LANGHORNE CLEMENS to change his name to MARK TWAIN!

programme.title: Herding Sheep In Iceland
programme.desc: Starting at the beginning of September, the Northern Lights unveil their magical patterns on Icelands starry skies. At the same time, Icelanders celebrate the "Retir": sheep and horses are herded to the lowlands. 4,500 sheep and 800 horses spend 3 to 4 months in the untamed highlands. Now, they are rounded up. No single farmer can herd so many animals to the lowlands. The entire community helps.

programme.title: What In the World

programme.title: Slepkavība, noslēpumi un mana ģimene
programme.desc: Advokāti atkārtoti izmeklē jaunas vācietes slepkavību, ko 1954. gadā veica viņas Kipras grieķu izcelsmes sievasmāte Hempstedā. Noslepkavotās sievietes dēls uzskata, ka viņa vecmāmiņa bija tiesas kļūdas upuris.

programme.title: Duo Mix
programme.desc: Nakts programma ar mūzikas video dažādām gaumēm. Dejojiet, dziediet līdzi vai izbaudiet, guļot zem segas.

programme.title: Pirmās 48 stundas
programme.desc: Talsā ar jaunu sparu aizsākta neatrisināta lieta - jauni pierādījumi izgaismo faktus par miruša vīrieša draugu.

programme.title: Pirmās 48 stundas
programme.desc: Izmeklētājs Džons Brauns sacenšas ar laiku - Talsā tiek nošauta nevainīga vecmāmiņa. Vai pusaudži varētu būt viņas traģiskās nāves vaininieki?

programme.title: Pirmās 48 stundas
programme.desc: Harisa apgabalā ceļa malā tiek atrasta sasieta sieviete. Lietu izmeklē seržants Džeimss Dousejs. Viņš atklāj, ka, iespējams, jāmeklē sērijveida slepkavu.

programme.title: Slepkavojošie radi
programme.desc: Dvīņubrāļi, kas audzināti ar dziļu nicinājumu pret tiesībsargājošajām iestādēm, tiek arestēti par kaimiņu suņa nošaušanu. Abi pēcāk izbēg no apcietinājuma un dodas klejojumos, izraisot vienu no nāvējošākajām apšaudēm Kolorado vēsturē.

programme.title: Slepkavojošie radi
programme.desc: Metjū un Tailers, kas uzauguši stingru vecāku klātbūtnē, uzskata, ka viņu pienākums ir attīrīt pasauli no grēkā dzīvojošajiem. Kad divi vīrieši tiek atrasti miruši, saikne ar brāļiem norāda uz naida pēdām.

programme.title: Ņujorkas slepkavība
programme.desc: Neatkarīgo filmu zvaigzne atrasta mirusi Griničvilidžā, un tas ir šķietama pašnāvība. Kad izmeklētāji sāk atklāt vienu baismīgu pavedienu pēc otra, viņi saprot, ka lietas nav tādas, kā šķiet.

programme.title: Ņujorkas slepkavība
programme.desc: Policija Austrumhārlemā atklāj divus noslepkavotus mīļākos. Nozagts tālrunis ved viņus ekspedīcijā uz Ņujorkas noziedzīgās pagrīdes centru un ne tikai. Patiesība, kas slēpjas aiz asinsizliešanas, viņus pilnībā apstulbina.

programme.title: Ņujorkas slepkavība
programme.desc: Ievērojams krievu uzņēmējs pazūd no neparastas apkaimes Steitenailendā. Izmeklētāji uzskata, ka vainojamas krievu bandas. Lietā tiek veikta virkne pagriezienu, lai atklātu visticamākos aizdomās turamos.

programme.title: Slepkavība, noslēpumi un mana ģimene
programme.desc: Advokāti rūpīgi izmeklē vardarbīgu zādzību 1931. gadā, kuras rezultātā 54 ​​gadus vecā atraitne Annija Luīze Kempsone savā Oksfordas mājā tika nodurta līdz nāvei.

programme.title: Slepkavība, noslēpumi un mana ģimene
programme.desc: Džeremijs un Saša pārbauda ar bandu saistītu slepkavību Klaphamkomonā 1953. gadā, kurā viens pusaudzis gāja bojā, bet vēl viens nokļuva bendes cilpas priekšā.

programme.title: Kriminālistika: slepkavas noķeršana
programme.desc: Kad Arbroutas pludmalē tiek izskalotas ķermeņa daļas, tiesu medicīnas izmeklētājiem ir jāatklāj satraucošā patiesība, kas slēpjas aiz sievietes nāves.

programme.title: Kriminālistika: slepkavas noķeršana
programme.desc: Dzīvoklī tiek atrasts līķis, kriminālistikas pierādījumu pārbaude ļauj detektīviem izšķirt draugu no ienaidnieka.

programme.title: Kriminālistika: slepkavas noķeršana
programme.desc: Traģisks stāsts par 22 gadus veco Helēnu Makortu, kura kādā naktī savā dzimtajā pilsētā izkāpa no autobusa, bet nekad nepārnāca netālu esošajā mājā.

programme.title: Vanity Fair: Konfidencionāli
programme.desc: Jaunais kulta autors J.T. LeRoy strauji izaudzis par zvaigzni, un tas ir patiesi ievērojams sasniegums. Tomēr šķiet, jo vairāk grāmatu viņš pārdod, jo dīvaināka kļūst viņa uzvedība. Vai tas ir pārāk daudz slavas pārāk ātri, vai aizkulisēs notiek kaut kas aizsomīgs?

programme.title: Vanity Fair: Konfidencionāli
programme.desc: Viņa ir modele. Playboy zaķis. Bet vai viņa arī ir slepkava? Daži sauc Lorensiju "Bambi" Bembeneku par perfekto TV slepkavu. Citi saka, ka viņa ir nevainīga. Divas Vanity Fair rakstnieces vēlas uzzināt - vai viņa tiešām nospieda gaili vai Bembijs tika uzmests?

programme.title: Pirmās 48 stundas
programme.desc: Talsā ar jaunu sparu aizsākta neatrisināta lieta - jauni pierādījumi izgaismo faktus par miruša vīrieša draugu.

programme.title: Pirmās 48 stundas
programme.desc: Izmeklētājs Džons Brauns sacenšas ar laiku - Talsā tiek nošauta nevainīga vecmāmiņa. Vai pusaudži varētu būt viņas traģiskās nāves vaininieki?

programme.title: Pirmās 48 stundas
programme.desc: Harisa apgabalā ceļa malā tiek atrasta sasieta sieviete. Lietu izmeklē seržants Džeimss Dousejs. Viņš atklāj, ka, iespējams, jāmeklē sērijveida slepkavu.

programme.title: Slepkavojošie radi
programme.desc: Dvīņubrāļi, kas audzināti ar dziļu nicinājumu pret tiesībsargājošajām iestādēm, tiek arestēti par kaimiņu suņa nošaušanu. Abi pēcāk izbēg no apcietinājuma un dodas klejojumos, izraisot vienu no nāvējošākajām apšaudēm Kolorado vēsturē.

programme.title: Slepkavojošie radi
programme.desc: Metjū un Tailers, kas uzauguši stingru vecāku klātbūtnē, uzskata, ka viņu pienākums ir attīrīt pasauli no grēkā dzīvojošajiem. Kad divi vīrieši tiek atrasti miruši, saikne ar brāļiem norāda uz naida pēdām.

programme.title: Ņujorkas slepkavība
programme.desc: Neatkarīgo filmu zvaigzne atrasta mirusi Griničvilidžā, un tas ir šķietama pašnāvība. Kad izmeklētāji sāk atklāt vienu baismīgu pavedienu pēc otra, viņi saprot, ka lietas nav tādas, kā šķiet.

programme.title: Ņujorkas slepkavība
programme.desc: Policija Austrumhārlemā atklāj divus noslepkavotus mīļākos. Nozagts tālrunis ved viņus ekspedīcijā uz Ņujorkas noziedzīgās pagrīdes centru un ne tikai. Patiesība, kas slēpjas aiz asinsizliešanas, viņus pilnībā apstulbina.

programme.title: Ņujorkas slepkavība
programme.desc: Ievērojams krievu uzņēmējs pazūd no neparastas apkaimes Steitenailendā. Izmeklētāji uzskata, ka vainojamas krievu bandas. Lietā tiek veikta virkne pagriezienu, lai atklātu visticamākos aizdomās turamos.

programme.title: Duo Mix
programme.desc: Nakts programma ar mūzikas video dažādām gaumēm. Dejojiet, dziediet līdzi vai izbaudiet, guļot zem segas.

programme.title: Pirmās 48 stundas
programme.desc: Atlantā pusaudzis tiek nogalināts, glābjot savu draugu un stājoties bruņota vīra priekšā. Talsā vīrietis tiek nošauts un atstāts baznīcas autostāvvietā, mēģinot pārdot zagtu automašīnu.

programme.title: Pirmās 48 stundas
programme.desc: Kāds vīrietis no Talsas tiek noslepkavots savas līgavas acu priekšā - nāve klauvē pie viņu durvīm. Mīļotais nošauts, aizsargājot savus draugus no uzbrucēja dusmām.

programme.title: Slepkavojošie radi
programme.desc: Pusaudžu brāļi Roberts un Maikls Bīveri dievina sērijveida slepkavas un sapņo būt par "visražīgākajiem" slepkavām vēsturē. Ar ieroču arsenālu viņu tiekšanās pēc bēdīgas slavas sākas mājās.

programme.title: Slepkavojošie radi
programme.desc: Brāļi Karri ierodas Vičitā, Kanzasas štatā, plānojot veikt laupīšanas. Abu plāni ātri vien pāraug slepkavības piedzīvojumā, kādu Kanzasa nekad nav redzējusi.

programme.title: Slepkavojošie radi
programme.desc: Pēc tam, kad vīrietis tiek atrasts brutāli noslepkavots savā bārā, gadu gaitā atklājas slepkavības noslēpums. Detektīvi uzskata, ka tas ir neveiksmīgs biznesa darījums, un viņiem ir nelokāmi jāturas pie šīs lietas.

programme.title: Ņujorkas slepkavība
programme.desc: Ņujorkas policijas izmeklētāji meklē slepkavu, kurš spīdzināja un izpildīja nāvessodu visu mīļotajai Ņujorkas publiskās skolas skolotājai. Viņi atklāj, ka upuris ir spēcīga uzņēmēja dēls.

programme.title: Ņujorkas slepkavība
programme.desc: Ar piecu gadu starpību tiek seksuāli izmantotas un nožņaugtas divas jaunas sievietes. Abas lietas vieno viens un tas pats nezināmais DNS. Kad abu gadījumu izmeklēšana nonāk strupceļā, Ņujorkas pilsētas un štata policijas 17 gadus vēlāk apvieno spēkus, lai atrastu slepkavu.

programme.title: Slepkavība, noslēpumi un mana ģimene
programme.desc: Džeremijs un Saša izmeklē lauku lietu par slepkavību Korkā, Īrijā 1894. gadā. Džons Tviss tika pakārts par Džeimsa Donovana slepkavību, taču viņš protestēja par savu nevainību līdz pat pašām beigām.

programme.title: Slepkavība, noslēpumi un mana ģimene
programme.desc: Advokāti Džeremijs Deins un Saša Vass izmeklē, vai 15 gadus vecais zēns, kas notiesāts par vietējās kroga saimnieces slepkavību 1921. gadā miegainajā Oksfordšīras ciematā Golovstrīgrīnā, ir patiesi vainīgs.

programme.title: Slepkavība, noslēpumi un mana ģimene
programme.desc: Advokāti atkārtoti izmeklē jaunas vācietes slepkavību, ko 1954. gadā veica viņas Kipras grieķu izcelsmes sievasmāte Hempstedā. Noslepkavotās sievietes dēls uzskata, ka viņa vecmāmiņa bija tiesas kļūdas upuris.

programme.title: Kriminālistika: slepkavas noķeršana
programme.desc: Sieviešu slepkava ir brīvībā vairāk nekā 30 gadus, līdz tiesu medicīnas izmeklētāji notikuma vietā viņu atklāj ar niecīgu pavedienu.

programme.title: Sekss un slepkavības
programme.desc: Vientuļā māte Ingrīda Laina atgriezās randiņu pasaulē. Kad viņa tiešsaistē satiek vīrieti, viņš šķiet lielisks, taču tas, kas notika tālāk, pārvērtās par vienu no šausminošākajiem noziegumiem nesenajā vēsturē.

programme.title: Vanity Fair: Konfidencionāli
programme.desc: Gubernatora palīdze pazūd bez vēsts. Viņas pazušana liek uzsākt izmeklēšanu, atklājot viena no štata ietekmīgākajiem cilvēkiem tumšos noslēpumus.

programme.title: Vanity Fair: Konfidencionāli
programme.desc: Ņujorkā pazūd jauna sieviete, un viņas ģimene ir pārliecināta, ka viņa ir noslepkavota. Kā noķert nenotveramu slepkavu, ja nevar pierādīt noziegumu? Izmeklētāji ir apņēmības pilni noskaidrot, kas īsti noticis.

programme.title: Vanity Fair: Konfidencionāli
programme.desc: Viņa ir zinātnes pirmā lēdija. Viņa ir baznīcas vadītāja sieva. Pēc tam, kad Šellija Miskevige pazūd no sabiedrības redzesloka, sabiedrība un daži baznīcas bijušie iekšējie cilvēki vēlas uzzināt - kas notika ar scientoloģijas pazudušo karalieni?

programme.title: Smieklīgā sieviete
programme.desc: Sofija tiek izraidīta uz Blekpūlu, lai gaidītu savu likteni. Nožēlas pilnais Klaivs nolemj viņu atgūt.

programme.title: Smieklīgā sieviete
programme.desc: Džemma Artertone tēlo Blekpūlas skaistumkaralieni, kura dodas uz 60. gadu Londonu, lai īstenotu savus šovbiznesa sapņus.

programme.title: Smieklīgā sieviete
programme.desc: Barbara iegūst sapņu lomu jaunā televīzijas komēdijā, taču ziņas no mājām apdraud viņas iespējas.

programme.title: Amerikāņu ģimenīte
programme.desc: Apmeklējot laimīgāko vietu uz zemes, nākas atminēties vecās atmiņas un radīt jaunas.

programme.title: Amerikāņu ģimenīte
programme.desc: Džejs un Glorija strīdas par to, ka viesmīle pret Džeju ir sirsnīgāka nekā Gloriju. Lūkam tiek piešķirta medaļa par viņa izraisītā ugunsgrēka dzēšanu. Fils mēģina atlaist Mičelu, bet Klēra un Kema cīnās par Kemas audzināšanas stratēģijām.

programme.title: Amerikāņu ģimenīte
programme.desc: Džejs un Menijs pavada Liliju uz viņas koncertu, kamēr Mičels un Kamerons aizņēmušies Gloriju kā tulku, adoptējot meksikāņu bērnu. Heilijai ir pārsteidzošs paziņojums par saviem plāniem pēc vidusskolas beigšanas.

programme.title: Amerikāņu ģimenīte
programme.desc: Glorija mēģina pārsteigt Džeju ar ziņu viņa dzimšanas dienā, ka viņa ir stāvoklī, savukārt Fils pārsteidz Džeju ar makšķerēšanas braucienu. Tikmēr Mičels un Kamerons diskutē par Lilijas kaķa iegūšanu, kad viņa zaudēja iespēju tikt pie brāļa.

programme.title: Amerikāņu ģimenīte
programme.desc: Fils un Klēra kļūst emocionāli, sūtot Heliju uz skolu. Menijs liek Džejam un Glorijai apmeklēt vecāku stundu. Mičels un Kamerons sastopas ar Lilijas skolas lesbiešu vecākiem.

programme.title: Visi mīl Reimondu
programme.desc: Rejs kļūst greizsirdīgs, jo Endija raksts publicēts "Sports Illustrated".

programme.title: Smieklīgā sieviete
programme.desc: Barbaras dzīve izmainās vienā naktī. Panākumu apreibināta, viņa uzsāk romānu ar kolēģi Klaivu.

programme.title: Ofiss
programme.desc: Viss birojs ir noraizējies par baumām par Dunder Mifflin bankrotu. Maikls mēģina novērst uzmanību, iesaistot visus slepkavības noslēpumu spēlē, taču Džims prāto, vai tā ir laba ideja.

programme.title: Ofiss
programme.desc: Maikls Dunder Mifflin akcionāru sapulcē runā ārpus pieteikuma un rada lielas problēmas vadībai, savukārt Džims atklāj, ka neviens birojā nedomā, ka viņš ir īstais priekšnieks.

programme.title: Ofiss
programme.desc: Pirms desmit gadiem Maikls apsolīja trešās klases skolēnu grupai, ka viņš maksās par viņu koledžas mācību maksu, ja viņi absolvēs. Tagad ir pienācis laiks maksāt, un viņš to nevar izdarīt. Birojā Dvaita mēneša darbinieka ideja ieved Džimu lielās nepatikšanās.

programme.title: Ofiss

programme.title: Ofiss
programme.desc: Baņķieris, kas pārstāv potenciālo pircēju, ierodas Skrantonas filiālē, lai pirms pārdošanas intervētu personāldaļu.

programme.title: Precējies... Ir bērni
programme.desc: Kellija uzaicina Pegiju uz savas skolas karjeras dienas prezentācijām.

programme.title: Precējies... Ir bērni
programme.desc: Al beidzot pārliecina Pegiju ieguldīties mājsaimniecības finansēs, taču jūtas satriekts, kad Pegija sāk nest mājās "uzdevumus" no sava kosmētikas pārdošanas darba, nopelnot vairāk naudas nekā Als. Ala jaunais nepilnas slodzes darbs nevar atgriezt viņu ģimenes apgādnieka statusā. Kad Als atrod grāmatu, kurā ir Pegijas klientu vārdi, situācija kļūst sliktāka.

programme.title: Precējies... Ir bērni
programme.desc: Vedot Pegiju atpakaļ no video veikala, Stīvs iekļūst satiksmē, un Pegija kādam vadītājam parāda pirkstu. Pēcāk Stīvs lūdz Bandijus nākt uz viņa un Mārsijas māju, lai noskatītos dažus video. Viņš baidās no atriebības - kad vīrietis viņam sekos mājās. Kāds pieklauvē pie ārdurvīm, un Als pārliecina Stīvu izdarīt pirmo sitienu... un Stīvs galu galā izkaujas ar liliputu.

programme.title: Precējies... Ir bērni
programme.desc: Pēc tam, kad viņi ir lūguši Bandijus pieskatīt savu māju, Mārsija un Stīvs atgriežas, atrodot lielu caurumu vietā, kur reiz bija viņu māja. Šķiet, Pegija tās pašas dienas sākumā bija pārpratusi demolētāju komandu, kas vēlējās nojaukt kādu "Stīva Roudas" māju, un tā vietā viņa tos novirzīja uz Stīva Roda māju, tāpēc Rodi ir spiesti pavadīt nakti Bendiju mājā.

programme.title: Smieklīgā sieviete
programme.desc: Barbaras dzīve izmainās vienā naktī. Panākumu apreibināta, viņa uzsāk romānu ar kolēģi Klaivu.

programme.title: Smieklīgā sieviete
programme.desc: Sofijas un Klaiva attiecības ir plaši pazīstamas, taču atklājums draud sagraut visu šovu.

programme.title: Smieklīgā sieviete
programme.desc: Sofija tiek izraidīta uz Blekpūlu, lai gaidītu savu likteni. Nožēlas pilnais Klaivs nolemj viņu atgūt.

programme.title: Amerikāņu ģimenīte
programme.desc: Klērai ir problēmas ar bērniem, un ​​Fils gatavojas veikt vazektomiju. Glorija atsakās valkāt grūtnieču drēbes. Mičels mudina Kameronu dabūt darbu.

programme.title: Amerikāņu ģimenīte
programme.desc: Fils ir sarūgtināts par to, ka Lūks vēlas atteikties no maģijas. Džejs mēģina tikt galā ar Glorijas krākšanu. Mičels risina uzdevumus, kamēr Kamerons sāk savu jauno mūzikas skolotāja darbu. Aleksa pēkšņi kļūst sarkastiskāka.

programme.title: Amerikāņu ģimenīte
programme.desc: Klēra Helovīna vakarā mēģina nobiedēt Filu. Kamerons ballītē mēģina parādīt savu jauno, slaidāko augumu. Mičela nevainīgie meli par Lilijas māti ieved viņu nepatikšanās.

programme.title: Amerikāņu ģimenīte
programme.desc: Izpārdošana Džeja mājā atklāj noslēpumu Glorijas pagātnē. Kad Fils izmēģina Džeja veco motociklu, atklājas viņa mežonīgā puse. Ir bažas, ka Aleksas jaunais draugs varētu būt gejs.

programme.title: Amerikāņu ģimenīte
programme.desc: Heilija tiek arestēta par nepilngadīgo alkohola lietošanu. Filam, Klērai un Mičelam jāiejaucas, atstājot Kameronu atbildīgo par bērniem. Džeja bijusī sieva Dede ierodas pārsteiguma vizītē, un viņš izmisīgi cenšas no viņas slēpt Glorijas grūtniecību.

programme.title: Bruklina
programme.desc: Komēdijseriāls seko detektīva Džeika Peralta un viņa daudzveidīgo un jauko kolēģu piedzīvojumiem Ņujorkas policijas 99. iecirknī.

programme.title: Visi mīl Reimondu
programme.desc: Marija plāno veselīgu Pateicības dienu, lai risinātu savas holesterīna problēmas.

programme.title: Visi mīl Reimondu
programme.desc: Roberta jaunajā dzīvoklī bez mitas viesojas izskatīgas sievietes. Rejs nespēj stāvēt malā.

programme.title: Visi mīl Reimondu
programme.desc: Kad Rejs uzdāvina saviem vecākiem Ziemassvētkos tosteri ar gravējumu, viņi to apmaina uzreiz, pat neatverot.

programme.title: Visi mīl Reimondu
programme.desc: Rejs uzzina, ka Frenks bērnībā ļāvis viņam uzvarēt galda tenisā, tādēļ viņš izaicina Frenku uz revanšu.

programme.title: Visi mīl Reimondu
programme.desc: Rejs stāsta par to, kā viņš pusaudža gados rīkoja ballītes, kad Marijas un Frenka nebija tuvumā. Māra jūk prātā.

programme.title: Divarpus vīri
programme.desc: Seriāls ir par diviem brāļiem — Čārliju un Alanu —, kas kopīgiem spēkiem audzina Alana dēlu Džeiku. Alans ir šķīries no sievas un pārcēlies dzīvot pie Čārlija, kas rada daudz komisku situāciju.

programme.title: Ofiss
programme.desc: Maikls ienīst izmaiņas, ko ievieš Dunder Mifflin jaunais īpašnieks, tāpēc viņš vēršas pēc padoma pie Deivida Vollesa. Džims un Pema atrod ideālu bērnudārzu, taču Džima kļūda draud izjaukt interviju.

programme.title: Ofiss
programme.desc: Sabre izpilddirektore vēlas, lai Skrantonas filiālei būtu viens vadītājs, un Maikls brīvprātīgi atkāpjas, ļaujot Džimam kļūt par priekšnieku. VIņš uzzinājis, ka pārdevēji pelna vairāk. Tomēr drīz vien viņš šo lēmumu nožēlo.

programme.title: Ofiss
programme.desc: Pemai sākušās dzemdības, un Džims ir gatavs vest viņu uz slimnīcu, taču viņa atsakās doties. Tikmēr, iedvesmojoties no Pēmas un Džima mazuļa, Dvaits un Andžela cenšas panākt "biznesa vienošanos", lai pašiem būtu savs bērniņš.

programme.title: Ofiss
programme.desc: Pēc bērna piedzimšanas Pemai ir grūtības ar barošanu ar krūti. Birojā Maikls uzņemas atbildību par Džima un Pemas savešanu kopā, un mēģina to pašu izdarīt ar Kevinu un Erinu, padarot Endiju greizsirdīgu.

programme.title: Ofiss
programme.desc: Ir Svētā Patrika diena, un izpilddirektore piespiež biroju strādāt vēlu, jo viņa neiet prom. Maikls neveiksmīgi mēģina pielabināties jaunajai vadībai, bet Endija un Erinas pirmais randiņš aizkavējas, jo Erina ir slima.

programme.title: Draugi
programme.desc: Seriāla galvenie varoņi ir seši draugi - Reičela, Monika, Fēbe, Džoijs, Čendlers un Ross, kuri dzīvo kaimiņos un regulāri nonāk aizraujošās un ļoti komiskās situācijās.

programme.title: Precējies... Ir bērni
programme.desc: Pegija iztērē 2800 dolārus no Ala grūti nopelnītā - 2000 dolāri telefona rēķiniem, 500 jaunai kleitai un 300 meikapam. Viņa nolēmusi apmeklēt savu un Ala vidusskolas salidojumu Polk High, kur Pegija izmisīgi cenšas panākt, lai sevi ievēlētu par karalieni.

programme.title: Precējies... Ir bērni
programme.desc: Pegija zaudē kroni Konijai, bet tad Als sāko pretoties Konijas vīram Džekam. Tikmēr Bads un Kellija sarīko ballīti, lai izbaudītu īstu ēdienu, jo mājās viņi nekad netiek pabaroti. Pegija izmanto cīņu starp Alu un Džeku, lai saņemtu palīdzību vēlēšanu viltošanā.

programme.title: Precējies... Ir bērni
programme.desc: Pēc tam, kad viņa divi labākie draugi ir atraduši sev randiņus, Bads izmisīgi meklē meiteni, kas ar viņu satiktos. Viņš ķeras pie dabiska izmēra manekena, kas uzdodas par viņa vakara randiņu.

programme.title: Precējies... Ir bērni
programme.desc: Bundiji iegādājas datoru, kas kalpo tikai kā cepuru plaukts. Neviens nezina, ka dators var runāt. Bet tikai ar Alu.

programme.title: Precējies... Ir bērni
programme.desc: Bandiji pavada dienu pludmalē.

programme.title: Women at War
programme.desc: Žannas medicīniskie talanti iespaido Džozefu, bet Agnesei joprojām ir aizdomas par viņas patieso identitāti. Margerita dodas uz frontes līniju, lai atgūtu Kolina vārda zīmes.

programme.title: Women at War
programme.desc: Uzbrukums pie ezera dod Karolīnai kādu ideju, Margerita palīdz bijušajām prostitūtām atrast darbu, bet Tils pārbauda Agneses ticību un lojalitāti.

programme.title: Mārlova slepkavību klubs
programme.desc: Džūditas pagātnes noslēpums var tikt atklāts, un trijotnei ir jāpaspēj notvert slepkava, pirms nav par vēlu.

programme.title: Agatas Kristi Mārpla
programme.desc: Sajūtot briesmas ap savu māsu Keriju Luīzu, Ruta Van Ridoka lūdz senas draudzenes mis Mārplas palīdzību, tomēr mēģinājuma laikā tiek nogalināts Kerijas Luīzas pusbrālis.

programme.title: Skārletas jaunkundze un Velingtons
programme.desc: Kad tiek noslepkavots tuvs Potsa kunga draugs, Elīza sāk pētīt tumšo un drūmo Viktorijas laikmeta apbedītāju pasauli.

programme.title: Lielas un mazas radības
programme.desc: Ir 1940. gada pavasaris, un Skeldeilas namā visus gaida pārmaiņas. Džeimss un Helēna prāto, kad pienāks īstais brīdis ģimenes pieaugumam, nezinot, vai Džeimsu iesauks armijā vai ne. Tristana prombūtni sajūt visi, bet visskarbāk Zigfrīds, kurš cenšas uzturēt pieaugošo mājsaimniecību un braši turēties gaidāmo izaicinājumu priekšā. Uzplaukst Holas kundzes un Helēnas draudzība, abas lūkojas nākotnē. Un ierodas jauns veterinārijas students Ričards Kārmondijs, radot ķibeles mājā.

programme.title: Mis Fišeres modernie izmeklēšanas noslēpumi
programme.desc: Ir Jaungada vakars, un uz kluba grīdas tiek atrasts populāras dziedātājas līķis. Mēs pagriežam laiku atpakaļ, un Peregrīne saprot, ka visu nakti ir vērojusi slepkavu, to neapzinoties.

programme.title: Lielas un mazas radības

programme.title: Mārlova slepkavību klubs
programme.desc: Džūdita, Beka un Sjūzija ir nonākušas līdz savu spēju robežai, jo visiem ir alibi. Vai izdosiet uzzināt, kurš nogalināja seru Pīteru, pirms cieš vēl kāds cits?

programme.title: Slepkavība mazpilsētā
programme.desc: Karls Albergs pārceļas uz klusu piekrastes pilsētiņu, jo ir noguris no policijas darba lielpilsētā. Tomēr viņam nākas izmantot visas prasmes, lai izmeklētu slepkavības, kas arvien turpina notikt.

programme.title: Dalgliešs
programme.desc: Dalgliešs dodas uz reliģisku skolu Rietumsaseksā, lai izmeklētu garīdznieka nāvi. Viņš atklāj, ka gandrīz neviens viņu necieta un ka vairāki liecinieki melo.

programme.title: Forsaiti
programme.desc: Džoilons atklāj, ka viņam piedzimuši ārpuslaulības dvīņi, Soames tēvs plāno izmanto Džoilona noslēpumu, lai viņu diskreditētu. Bet Soames, kurš iemīlējies Irēnā, nepārdomāti piedāvā noslēgt laulību.

programme.title: Grāmattārps
programme.desc: Ekscentrisks grāmatnīcas īpašnieks un bijušais spiegs Buks palīdz atrisināt slepkavības. Bijušais ieslodzītais Džeks sāk strādāt veikalā, kur viņu laipni uzņem, tomēr šķiet, ka ne viss ir kārtībā.

programme.title: Endavers
programme.desc: Endavers izmeklē astrofiziķa Ādama Dreika un viņa draudzenes Kristīnas nāves. Kad pierādījumi sāk norādīt uz slepkavību, Endavers lūdz ievainotā Tērsdeja palīdzību.

programme.title: Slepkavība mazpilsētā
programme.desc: Detektīvs Albergs izmeklē divu sieviešu noslēpumaino nāvi. Abas tika atrastas mežā dīvainās pozās.

programme.title: Agatas Kristi Mārpla
programme.desc: Sajūtot briesmas ap savu māsu Keriju Luīzu, Ruta Van Ridoka lūdz senas draudzenes mis Mārplas palīdzību, tomēr mēģinājuma laikā tiek nogalināts Kerijas Luīzas pusbrālis.

programme.title: Agatas Kristi Mārpla
programme.desc: Mirstoša vīra pēdējie vārdi aizved mis Mārplu un divus jaunus piedzīvojumu meklētājus pie disfunkcionālas ģimenes. Viņi izmeklē slepkavību sēriju un atbild uz jautājumu "Kāpēc viņi nejautāja Evansam?"

programme.title: Grāmattārps
programme.desc: Ekscentrisks grāmatnīcas īpašnieks un bijušais spiegs Buks palīdz atrisināt slepkavības. Bijušais ieslodzītais Džeks sāk strādāt veikalā, kur viņu laipni uzņem, tomēr šķiet, ka ne viss ir kārtībā.

programme.title: Mis Fišeres modernie izmeklēšanas noslēpumi
programme.desc: Pirms prestižās Melburnas suņu izstādes pilsētā notiek aktīva darbība, tomēr kāds skandāls apdraud tā norisi, kad tiek atrasts kāds miris dalībnieks.

programme.title: Mis Fišeres modernie izmeklēšanas noslēpumi
programme.desc: Kad bandas locekļa galva uzrodas uz boulinga celiņa, Peregrīne un Džeimss attopas divu Melburnas visnežēlīgāko pusaudžu bandu kara krustugunīs.

programme.title: Mis Fišeres modernie izmeklēšanas noslēpumi
programme.desc: Kad baložu sacensību entuziasta ķermenis tiek atrasts nosmērēts ar darvu baložu mājā, Peregrīne un Džeimss dodas uz vienu no Melburnas piepilsētas baložu sacīkšu klubiem.

programme.title: Mis Fišeres modernie izmeklēšanas noslēpumi
programme.desc: Ir Jaungada vakars, un uz kluba grīdas tiek atrasts populāras dziedātājas līķis. Mēs pagriežam laiku atpakaļ, un Peregrīne saprot, ka visu nakti ir vērojusi slepkavu, to neapzinoties.

programme.title: Mis Fišeres modernie izmeklēšanas noslēpumi
programme.desc: Banda satiekas pie upes, lai atpūstos un aizmirstu par problēmām, tomēr diena dabā beidzas ar slepkavību, kad Semjuls izmakšķerē līķi.

programme.title: Agatas Kristi Mārpla
programme.desc: Sajūtot briesmas ap savu māsu Keriju Luīzu, Ruta Van Ridoka lūdz senas draudzenes mis Mārplas palīdzību, tomēr mēģinājuma laikā tiek nogalināts Kerijas Luīzas pusbrālis.

programme.title: Mērdoka noslēpumi
programme.desc: Pēc tikšanās ar Ogdenu kādā krodziņā Mērdoks satiek populāru detektīvu, un jauna laimes meklētāja tiek atrasta mirusi.

programme.title: Skārletas jaunkundze un Velingtons
programme.desc: Detektīvs Ficrojs pamana, ka kāds no kolēģiem izmanto nepatiesus pierādījumus, lai apsūdzētu kādu aizdomās turamo. Tā kā Hercogs ir devies projām, viņš nolīgst Elīzu, lai izmeklētu korupciju policijā.

programme.title: Skārletas jaunkundze un Velingtons
programme.desc: Elīzai ir iespēja atrast milzīgu bagātību, kad viņa piedāvā palīdzību iespējamajam mantiniekam. Tomēr viņai būs jāiesaista arī Hercogs, lai gan jauni fakti padara šādu sadarbību neiespējamu.

programme.title: Skārletas jaunkundze un Velingtons
programme.desc: Elīza pa pastu saņem spridzekli. Kas to nosūtījis un kāpēc? Elīza apvienojas ar Hercogu, Mozu un seno ienaidnieku Patriku Nešu, lai uzzinātu, kas sūtījis šo nāvējošo dāvanu.

programme.title: Skārletas jaunkundze un Velingtons
programme.desc: Elīza ir pārņēmusi Londonas detektīvu aģentūru "Nešs un dēli"; tomēr ne viss izdodas. Viņas attiecībās ar Hercogu paliek skaidrs, ka jāpieņem lēmums, kas visu mainīs.

programme.title: Mārlova slepkavību klubs
programme.desc: Kad Džūdita Pota kļūst par slepkavības aculiecinieci un vietējā policija netic viņas stāstam, viņa nolemj veikt izmeklēšanu pati.

programme.title: Mārlova slepkavību klubs
programme.desc: Pēc vikāra sievas Bekas un suņu staidzinātājas Sjūzijas iesaistīšanās izmeklēšanā trijotne atklāj nozīmīgus pierādījumus, kas ļauj izdarīt kādu šokējošu atklājumu.

programme.title: Mārlova slepkavību klubs
programme.desc: Džūdita, Beka un Sjūzija tiek uzaicinātas palīdzēt policijai kā konsultantes un atklāj kādu svarīgu saikni starp slepkavībām.

programme.title: Mārlova slepkavību klubs
programme.desc: Džūditas pagātnes noslēpums var tikt atklāts, un trijotnei ir jāpaspēj notvert slepkava, pirms nav par vēlu.

programme.title: Mērdoka noslēpumi
programme.desc: Kad laukā tiek atrasti vairāki sadalījušies līķi, Mērdokam šķiet, ka citu kultūru vīriešiem uzbrūk sērijveida slepkava.

programme.title: Mērdoka noslēpumi
programme.desc: Kad strādnieka nāve izraisa streiku, Mērdokam rodas aizdomas, ka tas viss ir saistīts ar arodbiedrības veidošanos.

programme.title: Mērdoka noslēpumi
programme.desc: Pēc tikšanās ar Ogdenu kādā krodziņā Mērdoks satiek populāru detektīvu, un jauna laimes meklētāja tiek atrasta mirusi.

programme.title: Mērdoka noslēpumi
programme.desc: Atrodoties Londonā, Mērdoks, Ogdena un Suzanna cieš bumbas sprādzienā, ko, visticamāk, izraisīja nu jau mirusi sufražete.

programme.title: Forsaiti
programme.desc: Džoilons atklāj, ka viņam piedzimuši ārpuslaulības dvīņi, Soames tēvs plāno izmanto Džoilona noslēpumu, lai viņu diskreditētu. Bet Soames, kurš iemīlējies Irēnā, nepārdomāti piedāvā noslēgt laulību.

programme.title: Dalgliešs
programme.desc: Dalgliešs izmeklē slepkavību ietekmīgas Eseksas ģimenes mājā. Viņš apsver iespēju, ka uzbrukumam ir politiski motīvi. Kāds vietējais iedzīvotājs apgalvo, ka noticis sprādziens.

programme.title: Women at War
programme.desc: Žannas medicīniskie talanti iespaido Džozefu, bet Agnesei joprojām ir aizdomas par viņas patieso identitāti. Margerita dodas uz frontes līniju, lai atgūtu Kolina vārda zīmes.

programme.title: Women at War
programme.desc: Uzbrukums pie ezera dod Karolīnai kādu ideju, Margerita palīdz bijušajām prostitūtām atrast darbu, bet Tils pārbauda Agneses ticību un lojalitāti.

programme.title: Forsaiti
programme.desc: Džoilons atklāj, ka viņam piedzimuši ārpuslaulības dvīņi, Soames tēvs plāno izmanto Džoilona noslēpumu, lai viņu diskreditētu. Bet Soames, kurš iemīlējies Irēnā, nepārdomāti piedāvā noslēgt laulību.

programme.title: Dalgliešs
programme.desc: Dalgliešs dodas uz reliģisku skolu Rietumsaseksā, lai izmeklētu garīdznieka nāvi. Viņš atklāj, ka gandrīz neviens viņu necieta un ka vairāki liecinieki melo.

programme.title: Domina
programme.desc: Līvijai ir jāpalīdz Gajam saglabāt varu Senātā, lai gan viņas slepenā misija ir atjaunot Republiku, un vienlaikus jārisina skarbs ģimenes strīds starp viņas dēlu Tibēriju un Oktāvijas dēlu Marcellu.

programme.title: Domina
programme.desc: Gaja valdīšanas laiks, par kuru stāsta viņa sieva Līvija Drusilla, kura pilnībā mainīja izpratni par to, ko sievietes varētu gaidīt no dzīves, jo viņa kļuva par pasaules ietekmīgāko sievieti.

Почта
programme.desc: В почтовое отделение на должность экспедитора устраивается Елена (40 лет). Экспедитор Андрей (45) не очень доволен новой напарницей, он не доверяет женщинам за рулем. Но со временем между Еленой и Андреем возникает симпатия. И не без стараний со стороны их детей – Юли и Глеба. Андрей – одинокий папа, Елена - одинокая мама, казалось бы, ничего не может помешать их отношениям… Но тайны и ошибки прошлого сыграют с ними злую шутку… Бушуют страсти и в почтовом отделении. Руководитель отделения Артем (30) покоряет вершины почтовой карьеры и не желает замечать сотрудницу отделения Милану (25), которая мечтает заполучить его сердце. Мама Артема и его младший брат Гена также вносят в жизнь отделения свои коррективы… Все герои ежедневно сталкиваются с нестандартными ситуациями, но не остаются равнодушными к проблемам людей-клиентов почтового отделения, помогая им выпутаться из сложных историй…
